import Mathlib

import SBSProofs.Utils

local macro_rules | `($x ^ $y) => `(HPow.hPow $x $y)

open scoped RealInnerProductSpace
open BigOperators Finset ENNReal NNReal MeasureTheory

set_option trace.Meta.Tactic.simp.rewrite true
set_option maxHeartbeats 4000000

/-=====================================RKHS SECTION=====================================-/

/-
  Here we define the product RKHS and we prove that H ⊆ L²(μ)
-/

/-
  We provide a class definition for a generic RKHS
-/
class RKHS {E : Type*} {F : Type*} [Inner F (E → F)] (H : Set (E → F)) where
  k : E → E → F
  membership  : ∀ (x : E), k x ∈ H
  reproducing : ∀ f ∈ H, ∀ (x : E), f x = inner f (k x)



variable {d : ℕ}
/-
  We define a RKHS of ((Vector ℝ d) → ℝ) functions.
-/
variable (H₀ : Set ((Vector ℝ d) → ℝ)) [NormedAddCommGroup ((Vector ℝ d) → ℝ)] [InnerProductSpace ℝ (Vector ℝ d → ℝ)] [s : RKHS H₀]

/- We define the product RKHS as a space of function on ℕ → (Vector ℝ d) to ℝ (vector-valued function in our Lean formalism). A function belongs to such a RKHS if f = (f_1, ..., f_d) and ∀ 1 ≤ i ≤ d, fᵢ ∈ H₀. -/
variable (H : Set (ℕ → (Vector ℝ d) → ℝ)) [Inner ℝ (ℕ → Vector ℝ d → ℝ)]

def product_RKHS (H : Set (ℕ → (Vector ℝ d) → ℝ)) (H₀ : Set ((Vector ℝ d) → ℝ)) := ∀ (f : ℕ → (Vector ℝ d) → ℝ), (f ∈ H ↔ (∀ i ∈ range (d + 1), f i ∈ H₀))

def inner_product_H (H : Set (ℕ → (Vector ℝ d) → ℝ)) := ∀ f ∈ H, ∀ g ∈ H, ⟪f, g⟫ = ∑ i in range (d + 1), ⟪f i, g i⟫

variable [NormedAddCommGroup (ℕ → ℝ)]
/--
  The euclidean norm.
-/
def norm_H (H : Set (ℕ → (Vector ℝ d) → ℝ)) := ∀ f ∈ H, ∀x, (‖fun i ↦ f i x‖₊ : ℝ≥0∞) = sqrt (∑ i in range (d + 1), ‖f i x‖₊^2)

variable [MeasurableSpace (Vector ℝ d)]

/--
We define the integral operator Tkf.
-/
noncomputable def int_operator (μ : Measure (Vector ℝ d)) (f : (Vector ℝ d) → ℝ) : (Vector ℝ d) → ℝ := λ y ↦ ∫ x, s.k y x * f x ∂μ

/--
TODO. Define L².
-/
lemma 
Warning: declaration uses 'sorry'
 (f : (Vector ℝ d) → ℝ) : int_operator H₀ μ f ∈ H₀ := 
Goals accomplished! 🐙
d: ℕ
H₀: Set (Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
inst✝⁴: NormedAddCommGroup (Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
inst✝³: InnerProductSpace ℝ (Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
s: RKHS H₀
H: Set (ℕ → Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
inst✝²: Inner ℝ (ℕ → Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
inst✝¹: NormedAddCommGroup (ℕ → ℝ)
inst✝: MeasurableSpace (Vector ℝ d)
μ: Measure (Vector ℝ d)
f: Vector ℝ d → ℝ
int_operator H₀ μ f ∈ H₀
Goals accomplished! 🐙


def integral_is_finite (μ : Measure (Vector ℝ d)) (f : (Vector ℝ d) → ℝ) := ∃ (C : ℝ≥0), ∫⁻ x in Set.univ, ENNReal.ofReal |f x| ∂μ < C

/-
For simplicity, we will use this assumption to prove that some functions are mesurable. We don't use it for proving false statements.
-/
variable (h_m_set : ∀ (s : Set (Vector ℝ d)), MeasurableSet s)
/--
  H ⊆ L2(μ) i.e., ∀ f ∈ H, ∫⁻ Ω ||f x||^2 ∂μ < ∞.
-/
theorem H_subset_of_L2 (μ : Measure (Vector ℝ d)) (h1 : product_RKHS H H₀) (h2 : integral_is_finite μ (fun x ↦ s.k x x)) (h3 : norm_H H) : ∀ f ∈ H, ∫⁻ x in Set.univ, ENNReal.ofReal ‖fun i ↦ f i x‖^2 ∂μ < ∞ :=

inst✝¹: NormedAddCommGroup (ℕ → ℝ)

h3: norm_H H

∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ↑‖fun i => f i x‖₊ ^ 2 = ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖f i x‖₊ ^ 2
d: ℕ
H₀: Set (Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
inst✝⁴: NormedAddCommGroup (Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
inst✝³: InnerProductSpace ℝ (Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
s: RKHS H₀
H: Set (ℕ → Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
inst✝²: Inner ℝ (ℕ → Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
inst✝¹: NormedAddCommGroup (ℕ → ℝ)
inst✝: MeasurableSpace (Vector ℝ d)

μ: Measure (Vector ℝ d)
h1: product_RKHS H H₀
h2: integral_is_finite μ fun x => RKHS.k H₀ x x
h3: norm_H H
f: ℕ → Vector ℝ d → ℝ
finH: f ∈ H
abs_to_nnorm: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ENNReal.ofReal ‖fun i => f i x‖ = ↑‖fun i => f i x‖₊
x: Vector ℝ d
sq_coe: ↑(sqrt (∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ‖f i x‖₊ ^ 2)) ^ 2 = ↑(sqrt (∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ‖f i x‖₊ ^ 2) ^ 2)
↑(sqrt (∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ‖f i x‖₊ ^ 2)) ^ 2 = ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖f i x‖₊ ^ 2
d: ℕ
H₀: Set (Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
inst✝⁴: NormedAddCommGroup (Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
inst✝³: InnerProductSpace ℝ (Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
s: RKHS H₀
H: Set (ℕ → Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
inst✝²: Inner ℝ (ℕ → Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
inst✝¹: NormedAddCommGroup (ℕ → ℝ)
inst✝: MeasurableSpace (Vector ℝ d)
h_m_set: ∀ (s : Set (Vector ℝ d)), MeasurableSet s
μ: Measure (Vector ℝ d)
h1: product_RKHS H H₀
h2: integral_is_finite μ fun x => RKHS.k H₀ x x
h3: norm_H H
f: ℕ → Vector ℝ d → ℝ
finH: f ∈ H
abs_to_nnorm: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ENNReal.ofReal ‖fun i => f i x‖ = ↑‖fun i => f i x‖₊
∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ↑‖fun i => f i x‖₊ ^ 2 = ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖f i x‖₊ ^ 2
d: ℕ

h3: norm_H H
f: ℕ → Vector ℝ d → ℝ
finH: f ∈ H
abs_to_nnorm: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ENNReal.ofReal ‖fun i => f i x‖ = ↑‖fun i => f i x‖₊
x: Vector ℝ d
sq_coe: ↑(sqrt (∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ‖f i x‖₊ ^ 2)) ^ 2 = ↑(sqrt (∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ‖f i x‖₊ ^ 2) ^ 2)
↑(sqrt (∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ‖f i x‖₊ ^ 2) ^ 2) = ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖f i x‖₊ ^ 2
d: ℕ
H₀: Set (Vector ℝ d → ℝ)

inst✝³: InnerProductSpace ℝ (Vector ℝ d → ℝ)

h2: integral_is_finite μ fun x => RKHS.k H₀ x x
h3: norm_H H
f: ℕ → Vector ℝ d → ℝ
finH: f ∈ H
abs_to_nnorm: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ENNReal.ofReal ‖fun i => f i x‖ = ↑‖fun i => f i x‖₊
x: Vector ℝ d
sq_coe: ↑(sqrt (∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ‖f i x‖₊ ^ 2)) ^ 2 = ↑(sqrt (∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ‖f i x‖₊ ^ 2) ^ 2)
↑(sqrt (∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ‖f i x‖₊ ^ 2) ^ 2) = ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖f i x‖₊ ^ 2
d: ℕ
H₀: Set (Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
inst✝⁴: NormedAddCommGroup (Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
inst✝³: InnerProductSpace ℝ (Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
s: RKHS H₀
H: Set (ℕ → Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
inst✝²: Inner ℝ (ℕ → Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
inst✝¹: NormedAddCommGroup (ℕ → ℝ)
inst✝: MeasurableSpace (Vector ℝ d)
h_m_set: ∀ (s : Set (Vector ℝ d)), MeasurableSet s
μ: Measure (Vector ℝ d)
h1: product_RKHS H H₀
h2: integral_is_finite μ fun x => RKHS.k H₀ x x
h3: norm_H H
f: ℕ → Vector ℝ d → ℝ
finH: f ∈ H
abs_to_nnorm: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ENNReal.ofReal ‖fun i => f i x‖ = ↑‖fun i => f i x‖₊
∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ↑‖fun i => f i x‖₊ ^ 2 = ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖f i x‖₊ ^ 2
[Meta.Tactic.simp.rewrite] NNReal.sq_sqrt:1000, NNReal.sqrt (∑ i ∈ Finset.range (d + 1), ‖f i x‖₊ ^ 2) ^
      2 ==> ∑ i ∈ Finset.range (d + 1), ‖f i x‖₊ ^ 2
[Meta.Tactic.simp.rewrite] @ENNReal.coe_finset_sum:1000, ↑(∑ i ∈ Finset.range (d + 1),
        ‖f i x‖₊ ^ 2) ==> ∑ a ∈ Finset.range (d + 1), ↑(‖f a x‖₊ ^ 2)
[Meta.Tactic.simp.rewrite] ENNReal.coe_pow:1000, ↑(‖f x x✝‖₊ ^ 2) ==> ↑‖f x x✝‖₊ ^ 2
[Meta.Tactic.simp.rewrite] @eq_self:1000, ∑ x_1 ∈ Finset.range (d + 1), ↑‖f x_1 x‖₊ ^ 2 =
      ∑ x_1 ∈ Finset.range (d + 1), ↑‖f x_1 x‖₊ ^ 2 ==> True
Goals accomplished! 🐙
Goals accomplished! 🐙
d: ℕ
H₀: Set (Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
inst✝⁴: NormedAddCommGroup (Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
inst✝³: InnerProductSpace ℝ (Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
s: RKHS H₀
H: Set (ℕ → Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
inst✝²: Inner ℝ (ℕ → Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
inst✝¹: NormedAddCommGroup (ℕ → ℝ)
inst✝: MeasurableSpace (Vector ℝ d)
h_m_set: ∀ (s : Set (Vector ℝ d)), MeasurableSet s
μ: Measure (Vector ℝ d)
h1: product_RKHS H H₀
h2: integral_is_finite μ fun x => RKHS.k H₀ x x
h3: norm_H H
∀ f ∈ H, ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ENNReal.ofReal ‖fun i => f i x‖ ^ 2 ∂μ < ⊤
d: ℕ
H₀: Set (Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
inst✝⁴: NormedAddCommGroup (Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
inst✝³: InnerProductSpace ℝ (Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
s: RKHS H₀
H: Set (ℕ → Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
inst✝²: Inner ℝ (ℕ → Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
inst✝¹: NormedAddCommGroup (ℕ → ℝ)
inst✝: MeasurableSpace (Vector ℝ d)
h_m_set: ∀ (s : Set (Vector ℝ d)), MeasurableSet s
μ: Measure (Vector ℝ d)
h1: product_RKHS H H₀
h2: integral_is_finite μ fun x => RKHS.k H₀ x x
h3: norm_H H
f: ℕ → Vector ℝ d → ℝ
finH: f ∈ H
abs_to_nnorm: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ENNReal.ofReal ‖fun i => f i x‖ = ↑‖fun i => f i x‖₊
H_norm: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ↑‖fun i => f i x‖₊ ^ 2 = ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖f i x‖₊ ^ 2
∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ↑‖fun i => f i x‖₊ ^ 2 ∂μ < ⊤
[Meta.Tactic.simp.rewrite] H_norm:1000, ↑‖fun i => f i x‖₊ ^ 2 ==> ∑ i ∈ Finset.range (d + 1), ↑‖f i x‖₊ ^ 2

  -- We use the reproducing propriety of H₀ to rewrite f i x as ⟪f i, k x⟫.
  
d: ℕ
H₀: Set (Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
inst✝⁴: NormedAddCommGroup (Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
inst✝³: InnerProductSpace ℝ (Vector ℝ d → ℝ)

H_norm: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ↑‖fun i => f i x‖₊ ^ 2 = ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖f i x‖₊ ^ 2

H: Set (ℕ → Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
inst✝²: Inner ℝ (ℕ → Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
inst✝¹: NormedAddCommGroup (ℕ → ℝ)
inst✝: MeasurableSpace (Vector ℝ d)
h_m_set: ∀ (s : Set (Vector ℝ d)), MeasurableSet s
μ: Measure (Vector ℝ d)
h1: product_RKHS H H₀
h2: integral_is_finite μ fun x => RKHS.k H₀ x x
h3: norm_H H
f: ℕ → Vector ℝ d → ℝ
finH: f ∈ H
abs_to_nnorm: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ENNReal.ofReal ‖fun i => f i x‖ = ↑‖fun i => f i x‖₊
H_norm: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ↑‖fun i => f i x‖₊ ^ 2 = ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖f i x‖₊ ^ 2
x: Vector ℝ d
i: ℕ
iInRange: i ∈ range (d + 1)
f i x = ⟪f i, RKHS.k H₀ x⟫_ℝ
d: ℕ

inst✝³: InnerProductSpace ℝ (Vector ℝ d → ℝ)

d: ℕ
H₀: Set (Vector ℝ d → ℝ)

inst✝³: InnerProductSpace ℝ (Vector ℝ d → ℝ)

h_m_set: ∀ (s : Set (Vector ℝ d)), MeasurableSet s
μ: Measure (Vector ℝ d)
h1: product_RKHS H H₀
h2: integral_is_finite μ fun x => RKHS.k H₀ x x
h3: norm_H H
∀ f ∈ H, ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ENNReal.ofReal ‖fun i => f i x‖ ^ 2 ∂μ < ⊤
d: ℕ
H₀: Set (Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
inst✝⁴: NormedAddCommGroup (Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
inst✝³: InnerProductSpace ℝ (Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
s: RKHS H₀
H: Set (ℕ → Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
inst✝²: Inner ℝ (ℕ → Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
inst✝¹: NormedAddCommGroup (ℕ → ℝ)
inst✝: MeasurableSpace (Vector ℝ d)
h_m_set: ∀ (s : Set (Vector ℝ d)), MeasurableSet s
μ: Measure (Vector ℝ d)
h1: product_RKHS H H₀
h2: integral_is_finite μ fun x => RKHS.k H₀ x x
h3: norm_H H
f: ℕ → Vector ℝ d → ℝ
finH: f ∈ H
abs_to_nnorm: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ENNReal.ofReal ‖fun i => f i x‖ = ↑‖fun i => f i x‖₊
H_norm: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ↑‖fun i => f i x‖₊ ^ 2 = ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖f i x‖₊ ^ 2
rkhs: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖f i x‖₊ ^ 2 = ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖⟪f i, RKHS.k H₀ x⟫_ℝ‖₊ ^ 2
∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖f i x‖₊ ^ 2 ∂μ < ⊤
[Meta.Tactic.simp.rewrite] rkhs:1000, ∑ i ∈ Finset.range (d + 1),
      ↑‖f i x‖₊ ^ 2 ==> ∑ i ∈ Finset.range (d + 1), ↑‖⟪f i, RKHS.k H₀ x⟫_ℝ‖₊ ^ 2
d: ℕ
H₀: Set (Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
inst✝⁴: NormedAddCommGroup (Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
inst✝³: InnerProductSpace ℝ (Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
s: RKHS H₀

inst✝²: Inner ℝ (ℕ → Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
inst✝¹: NormedAddCommGroup (ℕ → ℝ)
inst✝: MeasurableSpace (Vector ℝ d)
h_m_set: ∀ (s : Set (Vector ℝ d)), MeasurableSet s
μ: Measure (Vector ℝ d)
h1: product_RKHS H H₀
h2: integral_is_finite μ fun x => RKHS.k H₀ x x
h3: norm_H H
f: ℕ → Vector ℝ d → ℝ
finH: f ∈ H
abs_to_nnorm: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ENNReal.ofReal ‖fun i => f i x‖ = ↑‖fun i => f i x‖₊
H_norm: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ↑‖fun i => f i x‖₊ ^ 2 = ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖f i x‖₊ ^ 2
rkhs: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖f i x‖₊ ^ 2 = ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖⟪f i, RKHS.k H₀ x⟫_ℝ‖₊ ^ 2
∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖⟪f i, RKHS.k H₀ x⟫_ℝ‖₊ ^ 2 ∂μ < ⊤
d: ℕ
H₀: Set (Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
inst✝⁴: NormedAddCommGroup (Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
inst✝³: InnerProductSpace ℝ (Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
s: RKHS H₀
H: Set (ℕ → Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
inst✝²: Inner ℝ (ℕ → Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
inst✝¹: NormedAddCommGroup (ℕ → ℝ)
inst✝: MeasurableSpace (Vector ℝ d)
h_m_set: ∀ (s : Set (Vector ℝ d)), MeasurableSet s
μ: Measure (Vector ℝ d)
h1: product_RKHS H H₀
h2: integral_is_finite μ fun x => RKHS.k H₀ x x
h3: norm_H H
f: ℕ → Vector ℝ d → ℝ
finH: f ∈ H
abs_to_nnorm: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ENNReal.ofReal ‖fun i => f i x‖ = ↑‖fun i => f i x‖₊
H_norm: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ↑‖fun i => f i x‖₊ ^ 2 = ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖f i x‖₊ ^ 2
rkhs: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖f i x‖₊ ^ 2 = ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖⟪f i, RKHS.k H₀ x⟫_ℝ‖₊ ^ 2
∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖⟪f i, RKHS.k H₀ x⟫_ℝ‖₊ ^ 2 ∂μ < ⊤


  -- Coersive squared Cauchy-Schwarz inequality : (↑‖⟪f i, k x⟫‖₊)² ≤ (↑‖f i‖₊)² (↑‖f x‖₊)².
  
d: ℕ
H₀: Set (Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
inst✝⁴: NormedAddCommGroup (Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
inst✝³: InnerProductSpace ℝ (Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
s: RKHS H₀
H: Set (ℕ → Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
inst✝²: Inner ℝ (ℕ → Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
inst✝¹: NormedAddCommGroup (ℕ → ℝ)
inst✝: MeasurableSpace (Vector ℝ d)
h_m_set: ∀ (s : Set (Vector ℝ d)), MeasurableSet s
μ: Measure (Vector ℝ d)
h1: product_RKHS H H₀
h2: integral_is_finite μ fun x => RKHS.k H₀ x x
h3: norm_H H
f: ℕ → Vector ℝ d → ℝ
finH: f ∈ H
abs_to_nnorm: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ENNReal.ofReal ‖fun i => f i x‖ = ↑‖fun i => f i x‖₊
H_norm: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ↑‖fun i => f i x‖₊ ^ 2 = ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖f i x‖₊ ^ 2
rkhs: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖f i x‖₊ ^ 2 = ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖⟪f i, RKHS.k H₀ x⟫_ℝ‖₊ ^ 2
∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖⟪f i, RKHS.k H₀ x⟫_ℝ‖₊ ^ 2 ∂μ < ⊤
Goals accomplished! 🐙
d: ℕ

inst✝⁴: NormedAddCommGroup (Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
inst✝³: InnerProductSpace ℝ (Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
s: RKHS H₀

inst✝²: Inner ℝ (ℕ → Vector ℝ d → ℝ)

inst✝: MeasurableSpace (Vector ℝ d)

rkhs: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖f i x‖₊ ^ 2 = ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖⟪f i, RKHS.k H₀ x⟫_ℝ‖₊ ^ 2
∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ∀ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖⟪f i, RKHS.k H₀ x⟫_ℝ‖₊ ^ 2 ≤ ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖RKHS.k H₀ x‖₊ ^ 2

μ: Measure (Vector ℝ d)
h1: product_RKHS H H₀
h2: integral_is_finite μ fun x => RKHS.k H₀ x x
h3: norm_H H
f: ℕ → Vector ℝ d → ℝ
finH: f ∈ H
abs_to_nnorm: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ENNReal.ofReal ‖fun i => f i x‖ = ↑‖fun i => f i x‖₊
H_norm: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ↑‖fun i => f i x‖₊ ^ 2 = ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖f i x‖₊ ^ 2
rkhs: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖f i x‖₊ ^ 2 = ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖⟪f i, RKHS.k H₀ x⟫_ℝ‖₊ ^ 2
x: Vector ℝ d
i: ℕ
_iInRange: i ∈ range (d + 1)
nn_cauchy: ‖⟪f i, RKHS.k H₀ x⟫_ℝ‖₊ ≤ ‖f i‖₊ * ‖RKHS.k H₀ x‖₊
h
↑‖⟪f i, RKHS.k H₀ x⟫_ℝ‖₊ ≤ ↑‖f i‖₊ * ↑‖RKHS.k H₀ x‖₊

h_m_set: ∀ (s : Set (Vector ℝ d)), MeasurableSet s
μ: Measure (Vector ℝ d)
h1: product_RKHS H H₀
h2: integral_is_finite μ fun x => RKHS.k H₀ x x
h3: norm_H H
f: ℕ → Vector ℝ d → ℝ
finH: f ∈ H
abs_to_nnorm: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ENNReal.ofReal ‖fun i => f i x‖ = ↑‖fun i => f i x‖₊
H_norm: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ↑‖fun i => f i x‖₊ ^ 2 = ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖f i x‖₊ ^ 2
rkhs: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖f i x‖₊ ^ 2 = ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖⟪f i, RKHS.k H₀ x⟫_ℝ‖₊ ^ 2
∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ∀ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖⟪f i, RKHS.k H₀ x⟫_ℝ‖₊ ^ 2 ≤ ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖RKHS.k H₀ x‖₊ ^ 2
Goals accomplished! 🐙
Goals accomplished! 🐙


  -- If f ≤ g, ∑ i in s, f ≤ ∑ i in s, g. Thus, ∑ i in range (d + 1), (↑‖⟪f i, k x⟫‖₊)² ≤ ∑ i in range (d + 1), (↑‖f i‖)² * (↑‖k x‖₊)².
  
d: ℕ
H₀: Set (Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
inst✝⁴: NormedAddCommGroup (Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
inst✝³: InnerProductSpace ℝ (Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
s: RKHS H₀
H: Set (ℕ → Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
inst✝²: Inner ℝ (ℕ → Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
inst✝¹: NormedAddCommGroup (ℕ → ℝ)
inst✝: MeasurableSpace (Vector ℝ d)
h_m_set: ∀ (s : Set (Vector ℝ d)), MeasurableSet s
μ: Measure (Vector ℝ d)
h1: product_RKHS H H₀
h2: integral_is_finite μ fun x => RKHS.k H₀ x x
h3: norm_H H
f: ℕ → Vector ℝ d → ℝ
finH: f ∈ H
abs_to_nnorm: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ENNReal.ofReal ‖fun i => f i x‖ = ↑‖fun i => f i x‖₊
H_norm: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ↑‖fun i => f i x‖₊ ^ 2 = ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖f i x‖₊ ^ 2
rkhs: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖f i x‖₊ ^ 2 = ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖⟪f i, RKHS.k H₀ x⟫_ℝ‖₊ ^ 2
cauchy_schwarz_sq: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ∀ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖⟪f i, RKHS.k H₀ x⟫_ℝ‖₊ ^ 2 ≤ ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖RKHS.k H₀ x‖₊ ^ 2
sum_le: (fun x => ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖⟪f i, RKHS.k H₀ x⟫_ℝ‖₊ ^ 2) ≤ fun x =>
  ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖RKHS.k H₀ x‖₊ ^ 2
∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖⟪f i, RKHS.k H₀ x⟫_ℝ‖₊ ^ 2 ∂μ < ⊤


  -- A lower-Lebesgue integral of a finite sum is equal to a finite sum of lower-Lebesgue integral.
  
d: ℕ
H₀: Set (Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
inst✝⁴: NormedAddCommGroup (Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
inst✝³: InnerProductSpace ℝ (Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
s: RKHS H₀
H: Set (ℕ → Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
inst✝²: Inner ℝ (ℕ → Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
inst✝¹: NormedAddCommGroup (ℕ → ℝ)
inst✝: MeasurableSpace (Vector ℝ d)
h_m_set: ∀ (s : Set (Vector ℝ d)), MeasurableSet s
μ: Measure (Vector ℝ d)
h1: product_RKHS H H₀
h2: integral_is_finite μ fun x => RKHS.k H₀ x x
h3: norm_H H
f: ℕ → Vector ℝ d → ℝ
finH: f ∈ H
abs_to_nnorm: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ENNReal.ofReal ‖fun i => f i x‖ = ↑‖fun i => f i x‖₊
H_norm: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ↑‖fun i => f i x‖₊ ^ 2 = ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖f i x‖₊ ^ 2
rkhs: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖f i x‖₊ ^ 2 = ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖⟪f i, RKHS.k H₀ x⟫_ℝ‖₊ ^ 2
cauchy_schwarz_sq: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ∀ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖⟪f i, RKHS.k H₀ x⟫_ℝ‖₊ ^ 2 ≤ ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖RKHS.k H₀ x‖₊ ^ 2
sum_le: (fun x => ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖⟪f i, RKHS.k H₀ x⟫_ℝ‖₊ ^ 2) ≤ fun x =>
  ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖RKHS.k H₀ x‖₊ ^ 2
∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖⟪f i, RKHS.k H₀ x⟫_ℝ‖₊ ^ 2 ∂μ < ⊤
Goals accomplished! 🐙
d: ℕ
H₀: Set (Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
inst✝⁴: NormedAddCommGroup (Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
inst✝³: InnerProductSpace ℝ (Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
s: RKHS H₀
H: Set (ℕ → Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
inst✝²: Inner ℝ (ℕ → Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
inst✝¹: NormedAddCommGroup (ℕ → ℝ)

h2: integral_is_finite μ fun x => RKHS.k H₀ x x
h3: norm_H H
f: ℕ → Vector ℝ d → ℝ
finH: f ∈ H
abs_to_nnorm: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ENNReal.ofReal ‖fun i => f i x‖ = ↑‖fun i => f i x‖₊
H_norm: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ↑‖fun i => f i x‖₊ ^ 2 = ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖f i x‖₊ ^ 2
rkhs: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖f i x‖₊ ^ 2 = ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖⟪f i, RKHS.k H₀ x⟫_ℝ‖₊ ^ 2
cauchy_schwarz_sq: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ∀ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖⟪f i, RKHS.k H₀ x⟫_ℝ‖₊ ^ 2 ≤ ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖RKHS.k H₀ x‖₊ ^ 2
sum_le: (fun x => ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖⟪f i, RKHS.k H₀ x⟫_ℝ‖₊ ^ 2) ≤ fun x =>
  ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖RKHS.k H₀ x‖₊ ^ 2
∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖RKHS.k H₀ x‖₊ ^ 2 ∂μ =
  ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖RKHS.k H₀ x‖₊ ^ 2 ∂μ

h2: integral_is_finite μ fun x => RKHS.k H₀ x x
h3: norm_H H
f: ℕ → Vector ℝ d → ℝ
finH: f ∈ H
abs_to_nnorm: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ENNReal.ofReal ‖fun i => f i x‖ = ↑‖fun i => f i x‖₊
H_norm: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ↑‖fun i => f i x‖₊ ^ 2 = ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖f i x‖₊ ^ 2
rkhs: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖f i x‖₊ ^ 2 = ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖⟪f i, RKHS.k H₀ x⟫_ℝ‖₊ ^ 2
cauchy_schwarz_sq: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ∀ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖⟪f i, RKHS.k H₀ x⟫_ℝ‖₊ ^ 2 ≤ ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖RKHS.k H₀ x‖₊ ^ 2
sum_le: (fun x => ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖⟪f i, RKHS.k H₀ x⟫_ℝ‖₊ ^ 2) ≤ fun x =>
  ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖RKHS.k H₀ x‖₊ ^ 2
∀ i ∈ range (d + 1), Measurable ((fun i x => ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖RKHS.k H₀ x‖₊ ^ 2) i)

i: ℕ
_InRange: i ∈ range (d + 1)
s: Set ℝ≥0∞
_h: MeasurableSet s
MeasurableSet ((fun i x => ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖RKHS.k H₀ x‖₊ ^ 2) i ⁻¹' s)

d: ℕ
H₀: Set (Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
inst✝⁴: NormedAddCommGroup (Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
inst✝³: InnerProductSpace ℝ (Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
s: RKHS H₀
H: Set (ℕ → Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
inst✝²: Inner ℝ (ℕ → Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
inst✝¹: NormedAddCommGroup (ℕ → ℝ)
inst✝: MeasurableSpace (Vector ℝ d)
h_m_set: ∀ (s : Set (Vector ℝ d)), MeasurableSet s
μ: Measure (Vector ℝ d)
h1: product_RKHS H H₀
h2: integral_is_finite μ fun x => RKHS.k H₀ x x
h3: norm_H H
f: ℕ → Vector ℝ d → ℝ
finH: f ∈ H
abs_to_nnorm: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ENNReal.ofReal ‖fun i => f i x‖ = ↑‖fun i => f i x‖₊
H_norm: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ↑‖fun i => f i x‖₊ ^ 2 = ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖f i x‖₊ ^ 2
rkhs: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖f i x‖₊ ^ 2 = ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖⟪f i, RKHS.k H₀ x⟫_ℝ‖₊ ^ 2
cauchy_schwarz_sq: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ∀ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖⟪f i, RKHS.k H₀ x⟫_ℝ‖₊ ^ 2 ≤ ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖RKHS.k H₀ x‖₊ ^ 2
sum_le: (fun x => ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖⟪f i, RKHS.k H₀ x⟫_ℝ‖₊ ^ 2) ≤ fun x =>
  ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖RKHS.k H₀ x‖₊ ^ 2
∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖RKHS.k H₀ x‖₊ ^ 2 ∂μ =
  ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖RKHS.k H₀ x‖₊ ^ 2 ∂μ
Goals accomplished! 🐙
Goals accomplished! 🐙


  -- Retrieve the majorant of the finite sum : ∑ i in range (d + 1), (↑‖f i‖₊)².
  
d: ℕ
H₀: Set (Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
inst✝⁴: NormedAddCommGroup (Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
inst✝³: InnerProductSpace ℝ (Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
s: RKHS H₀
H: Set (ℕ → Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
inst✝²: Inner ℝ (ℕ → Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
inst✝¹: NormedAddCommGroup (ℕ → ℝ)
inst✝: MeasurableSpace (Vector ℝ d)
h_m_set: ∀ (s : Set (Vector ℝ d)), MeasurableSet s
μ: Measure (Vector ℝ d)
h1: product_RKHS H H₀
h2: integral_is_finite μ fun x => RKHS.k H₀ x x
h3: norm_H H
f: ℕ → Vector ℝ d → ℝ
finH: f ∈ H
abs_to_nnorm: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ENNReal.ofReal ‖fun i => f i x‖ = ↑‖fun i => f i x‖₊
H_norm: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ↑‖fun i => f i x‖₊ ^ 2 = ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖f i x‖₊ ^ 2
rkhs: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖f i x‖₊ ^ 2 = ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖⟪f i, RKHS.k H₀ x⟫_ℝ‖₊ ^ 2
cauchy_schwarz_sq: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ∀ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖⟪f i, RKHS.k H₀ x⟫_ℝ‖₊ ^ 2 ≤ ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖RKHS.k H₀ x‖₊ ^ 2
sum_le: (fun x => ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖⟪f i, RKHS.k H₀ x⟫_ℝ‖₊ ^ 2) ≤ fun x =>
  ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖RKHS.k H₀ x‖₊ ^ 2
inverse_sum_int: ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖RKHS.k H₀ x‖₊ ^ 2 ∂μ =
  ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖RKHS.k H₀ x‖₊ ^ 2 ∂μ
finite_sum: ∃ C, ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑(‖f i‖₊ ^ 2) < ↑C
∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖⟪f i, RKHS.k H₀ x⟫_ℝ‖₊ ^ 2 ∂μ < ⊤
d: ℕ
H₀: Set (Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
inst✝⁴: NormedAddCommGroup (Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
inst✝³: InnerProductSpace ℝ (Vector ℝ d → ℝ)

h3: norm_H H
f: ℕ → Vector ℝ d → ℝ
finH: f ∈ H
abs_to_nnorm: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ENNReal.ofReal ‖fun i => f i x‖ = ↑‖fun i => f i x‖₊
H_norm: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ↑‖fun i => f i x‖₊ ^ 2 = ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖f i x‖₊ ^ 2
rkhs: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖f i x‖₊ ^ 2 = ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖⟪f i, RKHS.k H₀ x⟫_ℝ‖₊ ^ 2
cauchy_schwarz_sq: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ∀ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖⟪f i, RKHS.k H₀ x⟫_ℝ‖₊ ^ 2 ≤ ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖RKHS.k H₀ x‖₊ ^ 2
sum_le: (fun x => ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖⟪f i, RKHS.k H₀ x⟫_ℝ‖₊ ^ 2) ≤ fun x =>
  ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖RKHS.k H₀ x‖₊ ^ 2
inverse_sum_int: ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖RKHS.k H₀ x‖₊ ^ 2 ∂μ =
  ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖RKHS.k H₀ x‖₊ ^ 2 ∂μ
C1: ℝ≥0
finite_sum: ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑(‖f i‖₊ ^ 2) < ↑C1
intro
∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖⟪f i, RKHS.k H₀ x⟫_ℝ‖₊ ^ 2 ∂μ < ⊤


  -- Retrieve the majorant of the integral ∫⁻ (x : (Vector ℝ d)) in Set.univ, ↑|k x x| ∂μ, supposed finite.
  
d: ℕ
H₀: Set (Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
inst✝⁴: NormedAddCommGroup (Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
inst✝³: InnerProductSpace ℝ (Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
s: RKHS H₀
H: Set (ℕ → Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
inst✝²: Inner ℝ (ℕ → Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
inst✝¹: NormedAddCommGroup (ℕ → ℝ)
inst✝: MeasurableSpace (Vector ℝ d)
h_m_set: ∀ (s : Set (Vector ℝ d)), MeasurableSet s
μ: Measure (Vector ℝ d)
h1: product_RKHS H H₀
h3: norm_H H
f: ℕ → Vector ℝ d → ℝ
finH: f ∈ H
abs_to_nnorm: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ENNReal.ofReal ‖fun i => f i x‖ = ↑‖fun i => f i x‖₊
H_norm: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ↑‖fun i => f i x‖₊ ^ 2 = ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖f i x‖₊ ^ 2
rkhs: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖f i x‖₊ ^ 2 = ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖⟪f i, RKHS.k H₀ x⟫_ℝ‖₊ ^ 2
cauchy_schwarz_sq: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ∀ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖⟪f i, RKHS.k H₀ x⟫_ℝ‖₊ ^ 2 ≤ ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖RKHS.k H₀ x‖₊ ^ 2
sum_le: (fun x => ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖⟪f i, RKHS.k H₀ x⟫_ℝ‖₊ ^ 2) ≤ fun x =>
  ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖RKHS.k H₀ x‖₊ ^ 2
inverse_sum_int: ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖RKHS.k H₀ x‖₊ ^ 2 ∂μ =
  ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖RKHS.k H₀ x‖₊ ^ 2 ∂μ
C1: ℝ≥0
finite_sum: ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑(‖f i‖₊ ^ 2) < ↑C1
C2: ℝ≥0
h2: ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ENNReal.ofReal |(fun x => RKHS.k H₀ x x) x| ∂μ < ↑C2
intro.intro
∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖⟪f i, RKHS.k H₀ x⟫_ℝ‖₊ ^ 2 ∂μ < ⊤


  -- Rewrite ↑|k x x| as  ↑‖k x x‖₊.
  
d: ℕ
H₀: Set (Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
inst✝⁴: NormedAddCommGroup (Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
inst✝³: InnerProductSpace ℝ (Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
s: RKHS H₀
H: Set (ℕ → Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
inst✝²: Inner ℝ (ℕ → Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
inst✝¹: NormedAddCommGroup (ℕ → ℝ)
inst✝: MeasurableSpace (Vector ℝ d)
h_m_set: ∀ (s : Set (Vector ℝ d)), MeasurableSet s
μ: Measure (Vector ℝ d)
h1: product_RKHS H H₀
h3: norm_H H
f: ℕ → Vector ℝ d → ℝ
finH: f ∈ H
abs_to_nnorm✝: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ENNReal.ofReal ‖fun i => f i x‖ = ↑‖fun i => f i x‖₊
H_norm: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ↑‖fun i => f i x‖₊ ^ 2 = ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖f i x‖₊ ^ 2
rkhs: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖f i x‖₊ ^ 2 = ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖⟪f i, RKHS.k H₀ x⟫_ℝ‖₊ ^ 2
cauchy_schwarz_sq: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ∀ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖⟪f i, RKHS.k H₀ x⟫_ℝ‖₊ ^ 2 ≤ ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖RKHS.k H₀ x‖₊ ^ 2
sum_le: (fun x => ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖⟪f i, RKHS.k H₀ x⟫_ℝ‖₊ ^ 2) ≤ fun x =>
  ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖RKHS.k H₀ x‖₊ ^ 2
inverse_sum_int: ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖RKHS.k H₀ x‖₊ ^ 2 ∂μ =
  ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖RKHS.k H₀ x‖₊ ^ 2 ∂μ
C1: ℝ≥0
finite_sum: ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑(‖f i‖₊ ^ 2) < ↑C1
C2: ℝ≥0
h2: ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ENNReal.ofReal |(fun x => RKHS.k H₀ x x) x| ∂μ < ↑C2
abs_to_nnorm: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ENNReal.ofReal |RKHS.k H₀ x x| = ↑‖RKHS.k H₀ x x‖₊
intro.intro
∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖⟪f i, RKHS.k H₀ x⟫_ℝ‖₊ ^ 2 ∂μ < ⊤

f: ℕ → Vector ℝ d → ℝ

H_norm: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ↑‖fun i => f i x‖₊ ^ 2 = ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖f i x‖₊ ^ 2
rkhs: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖f i x‖₊ ^ 2 = ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖⟪f i, RKHS.k H₀ x⟫_ℝ‖₊ ^ 2
cauchy_schwarz_sq: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ∀ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖⟪f i, RKHS.k H₀ x⟫_ℝ‖₊ ^ 2 ≤ ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖RKHS.k H₀ x‖₊ ^ 2

  ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖RKHS.k H₀ x‖₊ ^ 2
inverse_sum_int: ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖RKHS.k H₀ x‖₊ ^ 2 ∂μ =
  ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖RKHS.k H₀ x‖₊ ^ 2 ∂μ
C1: ℝ≥0
finite_sum: ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑(‖f i‖₊ ^ 2) < ↑C1
C2: ℝ≥0
h2: ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ENNReal.ofReal |RKHS.k H₀ x x| ∂μ < ↑C2
abs_to_nnorm: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ENNReal.ofReal |RKHS.k H₀ x x| = ↑‖RKHS.k H₀ x x‖₊
intro.intro
∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖⟪f i, RKHS.k H₀ x⟫_ℝ‖₊ ^ 2 ∂μ < ⊤
[Meta.Tactic.simp.rewrite] abs_to_nnorm:1000, ENNReal.ofReal |RKHS.k H₀ x x| ==> ↑‖RKHS.k H₀ x x‖₊
d: ℕ
H₀: Set (Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
inst✝⁴: NormedAddCommGroup (Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
inst✝³: InnerProductSpace ℝ (Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
s: RKHS H₀
H: Set (ℕ → Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
inst✝²: Inner ℝ (ℕ → Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
inst✝¹: NormedAddCommGroup (ℕ → ℝ)
inst✝: MeasurableSpace (Vector ℝ d)

h1: product_RKHS H H₀
h3: norm_H H
f: ℕ → Vector ℝ d → ℝ
finH: f ∈ H
abs_to_nnorm✝: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ENNReal.ofReal ‖fun i => f i x‖ = ↑‖fun i => f i x‖₊
H_norm: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ↑‖fun i => f i x‖₊ ^ 2 = ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖f i x‖₊ ^ 2
rkhs: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖f i x‖₊ ^ 2 = ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖⟪f i, RKHS.k H₀ x⟫_ℝ‖₊ ^ 2
cauchy_schwarz_sq: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ∀ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖⟪f i, RKHS.k H₀ x⟫_ℝ‖₊ ^ 2 ≤ ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖RKHS.k H₀ x‖₊ ^ 2
sum_le: (fun x => ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖⟪f i, RKHS.k H₀ x⟫_ℝ‖₊ ^ 2) ≤ fun x =>
  ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖RKHS.k H₀ x‖₊ ^ 2
inverse_sum_int: ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖RKHS.k H₀ x‖₊ ^ 2 ∂μ =
  ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖RKHS.k H₀ x‖₊ ^ 2 ∂μ
C1: ℝ≥0
finite_sum: ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑(‖f i‖₊ ^ 2) < ↑C1
C2: ℝ≥0
abs_to_nnorm: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ENNReal.ofReal |RKHS.k H₀ x x| = ↑‖RKHS.k H₀ x x‖₊
h2: ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ↑‖RKHS.k H₀ x x‖₊ ∂μ < ↑C2
intro.intro
∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖⟪f i, RKHS.k H₀ x⟫_ℝ‖₊ ^ 2 ∂μ < ⊤
d: ℕ
H₀: Set (Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
inst✝⁴: NormedAddCommGroup (Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
inst✝³: InnerProductSpace ℝ (Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
s: RKHS H₀
H: Set (ℕ → Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
inst✝²: Inner ℝ (ℕ → Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
inst✝¹: NormedAddCommGroup (ℕ → ℝ)
inst✝: MeasurableSpace (Vector ℝ d)
h_m_set: ∀ (s : Set (Vector ℝ d)), MeasurableSet s
μ: Measure (Vector ℝ d)
h1: product_RKHS H H₀
h3: norm_H H
f: ℕ → Vector ℝ d → ℝ
finH: f ∈ H
abs_to_nnorm✝: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ENNReal.ofReal ‖fun i => f i x‖ = ↑‖fun i => f i x‖₊
H_norm: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ↑‖fun i => f i x‖₊ ^ 2 = ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖f i x‖₊ ^ 2
rkhs: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖f i x‖₊ ^ 2 = ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖⟪f i, RKHS.k H₀ x⟫_ℝ‖₊ ^ 2
cauchy_schwarz_sq: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ∀ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖⟪f i, RKHS.k H₀ x⟫_ℝ‖₊ ^ 2 ≤ ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖RKHS.k H₀ x‖₊ ^ 2
sum_le: (fun x => ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖⟪f i, RKHS.k H₀ x⟫_ℝ‖₊ ^ 2) ≤ fun x =>
  ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖RKHS.k H₀ x‖₊ ^ 2
inverse_sum_int: ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖RKHS.k H₀ x‖₊ ^ 2 ∂μ =
  ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖RKHS.k H₀ x‖₊ ^ 2 ∂μ
C1: ℝ≥0
finite_sum: ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑(‖f i‖₊ ^ 2) < ↑C1
C2: ℝ≥0
abs_to_nnorm: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ENNReal.ofReal |RKHS.k H₀ x x| = ↑‖RKHS.k H₀ x x‖₊
h2: ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ↑‖RKHS.k H₀ x x‖₊ ∂μ < ↑C2
intro.intro
∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖⟪f i, RKHS.k H₀ x⟫_ℝ‖₊ ^ 2 ∂μ < ⊤


  -- 1. ∀ f ≤ g, ∫⁻ x, f x ∂μ ≤ ∫⁻ x, g x ∂μ. We use this lemma with *sum_le*.
  
d: ℕ
H₀: Set (Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
inst✝⁴: NormedAddCommGroup (Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
inst✝³: InnerProductSpace ℝ (Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
s: RKHS H₀
H: Set (ℕ → Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
inst✝²: Inner ℝ (ℕ → Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
inst✝¹: NormedAddCommGroup (ℕ → ℝ)
inst✝: MeasurableSpace (Vector ℝ d)
h_m_set: ∀ (s : Set (Vector ℝ d)), MeasurableSet s
μ: Measure (Vector ℝ d)
h1: product_RKHS H H₀
h3: norm_H H
f: ℕ → Vector ℝ d → ℝ
finH: f ∈ H
abs_to_nnorm✝: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ENNReal.ofReal ‖fun i => f i x‖ = ↑‖fun i => f i x‖₊
H_norm: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ↑‖fun i => f i x‖₊ ^ 2 = ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖f i x‖₊ ^ 2
rkhs: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖f i x‖₊ ^ 2 = ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖⟪f i, RKHS.k H₀ x⟫_ℝ‖₊ ^ 2
cauchy_schwarz_sq: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ∀ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖⟪f i, RKHS.k H₀ x⟫_ℝ‖₊ ^ 2 ≤ ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖RKHS.k H₀ x‖₊ ^ 2
sum_le: (fun x => ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖⟪f i, RKHS.k H₀ x⟫_ℝ‖₊ ^ 2) ≤ fun x =>
  ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖RKHS.k H₀ x‖₊ ^ 2
inverse_sum_int: ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖RKHS.k H₀ x‖₊ ^ 2 ∂μ =
  ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖RKHS.k H₀ x‖₊ ^ 2 ∂μ
C1: ℝ≥0
finite_sum: ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑(‖f i‖₊ ^ 2) < ↑C1
C2: ℝ≥0
abs_to_nnorm: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ENNReal.ofReal |RKHS.k H₀ x x| = ↑‖RKHS.k H₀ x x‖₊
h2: ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ↑‖RKHS.k H₀ x x‖₊ ∂μ < ↑C2
intro.intro
∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖⟪f i, RKHS.k H₀ x⟫_ℝ‖₊ ^ 2 ∂μ < ⊤
Goals accomplished! 🐙
d: ℕ
H₀: Set (Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
inst✝⁴: NormedAddCommGroup (Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
inst✝³: InnerProductSpace ℝ (Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
s: RKHS H₀
H: Set (ℕ → Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
inst✝²: Inner ℝ (ℕ → Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
inst✝¹: NormedAddCommGroup (ℕ → ℝ)
inst✝: MeasurableSpace (Vector ℝ d)
h_m_set: ∀ (s : Set (Vector ℝ d)), MeasurableSet s

h1: product_RKHS H H₀
h3: norm_H H
f: ℕ → Vector ℝ d → ℝ
finH: f ∈ H
abs_to_nnorm✝: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ENNReal.ofReal ‖fun i => f i x‖ = ↑‖fun i => f i x‖₊
H_norm: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ↑‖fun i => f i x‖₊ ^ 2 = ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖f i x‖₊ ^ 2
rkhs: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖f i x‖₊ ^ 2 = ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖⟪f i, RKHS.k H₀ x⟫_ℝ‖₊ ^ 2
cauchy_schwarz_sq: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ∀ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖⟪f i, RKHS.k H₀ x⟫_ℝ‖₊ ^ 2 ≤ ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖RKHS.k H₀ x‖₊ ^ 2
sum_le: (fun x => ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖⟪f i, RKHS.k H₀ x⟫_ℝ‖₊ ^ 2) ≤ fun x =>
  ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖RKHS.k H₀ x‖₊ ^ 2
inverse_sum_int: ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖RKHS.k H₀ x‖₊ ^ 2 ∂μ =
  ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖RKHS.k H₀ x‖₊ ^ 2 ∂μ
C1: ℝ≥0
finite_sum: ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑(‖f i‖₊ ^ 2) < ↑C1
C2: ℝ≥0
abs_to_nnorm: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ENNReal.ofReal |RKHS.k H₀ x x| = ↑‖RKHS.k H₀ x x‖₊
h2: ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ↑‖RKHS.k H₀ x x‖₊ ∂μ < ↑C2
∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖RKHS.k H₀ x‖₊ ^ 2 ∂μ =
  ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ↑‖RKHS.k H₀ x‖₊ ^ 2 ∂μ

  ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖RKHS.k H₀ x‖₊ ^ 2
inverse_sum_int: ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖RKHS.k H₀ x‖₊ ^ 2 ∂μ =
  ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖RKHS.k H₀ x‖₊ ^ 2 ∂μ
C1: ℝ≥0
finite_sum: ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑(‖f i‖₊ ^ 2) < ↑C1
C2: ℝ≥0
abs_to_nnorm: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ENNReal.ofReal |RKHS.k H₀ x x| = ↑‖RKHS.k H₀ x x‖₊
h2: ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ↑‖RKHS.k H₀ x x‖₊ ∂μ < ↑C2
Measurable fun x => ↑‖RKHS.k H₀ x‖₊ ^ 2
d: ℕ
H₀: Set (Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
inst✝⁴: NormedAddCommGroup (Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
inst✝³: InnerProductSpace ℝ (Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
s✝: RKHS H₀
H: Set (ℕ → Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
inst✝²: Inner ℝ (ℕ → Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
inst✝¹: NormedAddCommGroup (ℕ → ℝ)
inst✝: MeasurableSpace (Vector ℝ d)
h_m_set: ∀ (s : Set (Vector ℝ d)), MeasurableSet s
μ: Measure (Vector ℝ d)
h1: product_RKHS H H₀
h3: norm_H H
f: ℕ → Vector ℝ d → ℝ
finH: f ∈ H
abs_to_nnorm✝: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ENNReal.ofReal ‖fun i => f i x‖ = ↑‖fun i => f i x‖₊
H_norm: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ↑‖fun i => f i x‖₊ ^ 2 = ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖f i x‖₊ ^ 2
rkhs: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖f i x‖₊ ^ 2 = ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖⟪f i, RKHS.k H₀ x⟫_ℝ‖₊ ^ 2
cauchy_schwarz_sq: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ∀ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖⟪f i, RKHS.k H₀ x⟫_ℝ‖₊ ^ 2 ≤ ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖RKHS.k H₀ x‖₊ ^ 2
sum_le: (fun x => ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖⟪f i, RKHS.k H₀ x⟫_ℝ‖₊ ^ 2) ≤ fun x =>
  ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖RKHS.k H₀ x‖₊ ^ 2
inverse_sum_int: ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖RKHS.k H₀ x‖₊ ^ 2 ∂μ =
  ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖RKHS.k H₀ x‖₊ ^ 2 ∂μ
C1: ℝ≥0
finite_sum: ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑(‖f i‖₊ ^ 2) < ↑C1
C2: ℝ≥0
abs_to_nnorm: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ENNReal.ofReal |RKHS.k H₀ x x| = ↑‖RKHS.k H₀ x x‖₊
h2: ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ↑‖RKHS.k H₀ x x‖₊ ∂μ < ↑C2
s: Set ℝ≥0∞
_hs: MeasurableSet s
MeasurableSet ((fun x => ↑‖RKHS.k H₀ x‖₊ ^ 2) ⁻¹' s)

  ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖RKHS.k H₀ x‖₊ ^ 2

h3: norm_H H
f: ℕ → Vector ℝ d → ℝ
finH: f ∈ H
abs_to_nnorm✝: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ENNReal.ofReal ‖fun i => f i x‖ = ↑‖fun i => f i x‖₊
H_norm: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ↑‖fun i => f i x‖₊ ^ 2 = ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖f i x‖₊ ^ 2
rkhs: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖f i x‖₊ ^ 2 = ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖⟪f i, RKHS.k H₀ x⟫_ℝ‖₊ ^ 2
cauchy_schwarz_sq: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ∀ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖⟪f i, RKHS.k H₀ x⟫_ℝ‖₊ ^ 2 ≤ ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖RKHS.k H₀ x‖₊ ^ 2
sum_le: (fun x => ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖⟪f i, RKHS.k H₀ x⟫_ℝ‖₊ ^ 2) ≤ fun x =>
  ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖RKHS.k H₀ x‖₊ ^ 2
inverse_sum_int: ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖RKHS.k H₀ x‖₊ ^ 2 ∂μ =
  ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖RKHS.k H₀ x‖₊ ^ 2 ∂μ
C1: ℝ≥0
finite_sum: ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑(‖f i‖₊ ^ 2) < ↑C1
C2: ℝ≥0
abs_to_nnorm: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ENNReal.ofReal |RKHS.k H₀ x x| = ↑‖RKHS.k H₀ x x‖₊
h2: ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ↑‖RKHS.k H₀ x x‖₊ ∂μ < ↑C2
is_measurable: Measurable fun x => ↑‖RKHS.k H₀ x‖₊ ^ 2
i: ℕ
∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖RKHS.k H₀ x‖₊ ^ 2 ∂μ =
  ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ↑‖RKHS.k H₀ x‖₊ ^ 2 ∂μ
d: ℕ
H₀: Set (Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
inst✝⁴: NormedAddCommGroup (Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
inst✝³: InnerProductSpace ℝ (Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
s: RKHS H₀
H: Set (ℕ → Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
inst✝²: Inner ℝ (ℕ → Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
inst✝¹: NormedAddCommGroup (ℕ → ℝ)
inst✝: MeasurableSpace (Vector ℝ d)
h_m_set: ∀ (s : Set (Vector ℝ d)), MeasurableSet s
μ: Measure (Vector ℝ d)
h1: product_RKHS H H₀
h3: norm_H H
f: ℕ → Vector ℝ d → ℝ
finH: f ∈ H
abs_to_nnorm✝: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ENNReal.ofReal ‖fun i => f i x‖ = ↑‖fun i => f i x‖₊
H_norm: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ↑‖fun i => f i x‖₊ ^ 2 = ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖f i x‖₊ ^ 2
rkhs: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖f i x‖₊ ^ 2 = ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖⟪f i, RKHS.k H₀ x⟫_ℝ‖₊ ^ 2
cauchy_schwarz_sq: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ∀ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖⟪f i, RKHS.k H₀ x⟫_ℝ‖₊ ^ 2 ≤ ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖RKHS.k H₀ x‖₊ ^ 2
sum_le: (fun x => ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖⟪f i, RKHS.k H₀ x⟫_ℝ‖₊ ^ 2) ≤ fun x =>
  ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖RKHS.k H₀ x‖₊ ^ 2
inverse_sum_int: ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖RKHS.k H₀ x‖₊ ^ 2 ∂μ =
  ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖RKHS.k H₀ x‖₊ ^ 2 ∂μ
C1: ℝ≥0
finite_sum: ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑(‖f i‖₊ ^ 2) < ↑C1
C2: ℝ≥0
abs_to_nnorm: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ENNReal.ofReal |RKHS.k H₀ x x| = ↑‖RKHS.k H₀ x x‖₊
h2: ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ↑‖RKHS.k H₀ x x‖₊ ∂μ < ↑C2
is_measurable: Measurable fun x => ↑‖RKHS.k H₀ x‖₊ ^ 2
∀ (i : ℕ),
  ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖RKHS.k H₀ x‖₊ ^ 2 ∂μ =
    ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ↑‖RKHS.k H₀ x‖₊ ^ 2 ∂μ
Goals accomplished! 🐙

d: ℕ
H₀: Set (Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
inst✝⁴: NormedAddCommGroup (Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
inst✝³: InnerProductSpace ℝ (Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
s: RKHS H₀
H: Set (ℕ → Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
inst✝²: Inner ℝ (ℕ → Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
inst✝¹: NormedAddCommGroup (ℕ → ℝ)
inst✝: MeasurableSpace (Vector ℝ d)
h_m_set: ∀ (s : Set (Vector ℝ d)), MeasurableSet s
μ: Measure (Vector ℝ d)
h1: product_RKHS H H₀
h3: norm_H H
f: ℕ → Vector ℝ d → ℝ
finH: f ∈ H
abs_to_nnorm✝: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ENNReal.ofReal ‖fun i => f i x‖ = ↑‖fun i => f i x‖₊
H_norm: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ↑‖fun i => f i x‖₊ ^ 2 = ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖f i x‖₊ ^ 2
rkhs: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖f i x‖₊ ^ 2 = ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖⟪f i, RKHS.k H₀ x⟫_ℝ‖₊ ^ 2
cauchy_schwarz_sq: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ∀ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖⟪f i, RKHS.k H₀ x⟫_ℝ‖₊ ^ 2 ≤ ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖RKHS.k H₀ x‖₊ ^ 2
sum_le: (fun x => ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖⟪f i, RKHS.k H₀ x⟫_ℝ‖₊ ^ 2) ≤ fun x =>
  ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖RKHS.k H₀ x‖₊ ^ 2
inverse_sum_int: ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖RKHS.k H₀ x‖₊ ^ 2 ∂μ =
  ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖RKHS.k H₀ x‖₊ ^ 2 ∂μ
C1: ℝ≥0
finite_sum: ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑(‖f i‖₊ ^ 2) < ↑C1
C2: ℝ≥0
abs_to_nnorm: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ENNReal.ofReal |RKHS.k H₀ x x| = ↑‖RKHS.k H₀ x x‖₊
h2: ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ↑‖RKHS.k H₀ x x‖₊ ∂μ < ↑C2
∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖RKHS.k H₀ x‖₊ ^ 2 ∂μ =
  ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ↑‖RKHS.k H₀ x‖₊ ^ 2 ∂μ
d: ℕ
H₀: Set (Vector ℝ d → ℝ)

inst✝³: InnerProductSpace ℝ (Vector ℝ d → ℝ)

H: Set (ℕ → Vector ℝ d → ℝ)

h_m_set: ∀ (s : Set (Vector ℝ d)), MeasurableSet s
μ: Measure (Vector ℝ d)
h1: product_RKHS H H₀
h3: norm_H H
f: ℕ → Vector ℝ d → ℝ
finH: f ∈ H
abs_to_nnorm✝: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ENNReal.ofReal ‖fun i => f i x‖ = ↑‖fun i => f i x‖₊
H_norm: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ↑‖fun i => f i x‖₊ ^ 2 = ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖f i x‖₊ ^ 2
rkhs: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖f i x‖₊ ^ 2 = ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖⟪f i, RKHS.k H₀ x⟫_ℝ‖₊ ^ 2
cauchy_schwarz_sq: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ∀ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖⟪f i, RKHS.k H₀ x⟫_ℝ‖₊ ^ 2 ≤ ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖RKHS.k H₀ x‖₊ ^ 2
sum_le: (fun x => ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖⟪f i, RKHS.k H₀ x⟫_ℝ‖₊ ^ 2) ≤ fun x =>
  ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖RKHS.k H₀ x‖₊ ^ 2
inverse_sum_int: ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖RKHS.k H₀ x‖₊ ^ 2 ∂μ =
  ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖RKHS.k H₀ x‖₊ ^ 2 ∂μ
C1: ℝ≥0
finite_sum: ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑(‖f i‖₊ ^ 2) < ↑C1
C2: ℝ≥0
abs_to_nnorm: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ENNReal.ofReal |RKHS.k H₀ x x| = ↑‖RKHS.k H₀ x x‖₊
h2: ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ↑‖RKHS.k H₀ x x‖₊ ∂μ < ↑C2
is_measurable: Measurable fun x => ↑‖RKHS.k H₀ x‖₊ ^ 2
const_int: ∀ (i : ℕ),
  ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖RKHS.k H₀ x‖₊ ^ 2 ∂μ =
    ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ↑‖RKHS.k H₀ x‖₊ ^ 2 ∂μ
∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖RKHS.k H₀ x‖₊ ^ 2 ∂μ =
  ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ↑‖RKHS.k H₀ x‖₊ ^ 2 ∂μ
[Meta.Tactic.simp.rewrite] const_int:1000, ∫⁻ (x_1 : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ,
      ↑‖f x‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖RKHS.k H₀ x_1‖₊ ^ 2 ∂μ ==> ↑‖f x‖₊ ^ 2 * ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ↑‖RKHS.k H₀ x‖₊ ^ 2 ∂μ
[Meta.Tactic.simp.rewrite] @eq_self:1000, ∑ x ∈ Finset.range (d + 1),
        ↑‖f x‖₊ ^ 2 * ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ↑‖RKHS.k H₀ x‖₊ ^ 2 ∂μ =
      ∑ x ∈ Finset.range (d + 1), ↑‖f x‖₊ ^ 2 * ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ↑‖RKHS.k H₀ x‖₊ ^ 2 ∂μ ==> True
Goals accomplished! 🐙
Goals accomplished! 🐙
Goals accomplished! 🐙


  -- Rewrite  (↑‖k x‖₊)² as ↑‖⟪k x, k x⟫‖₊ (lot of coercions).
  _ = ∑ i in range (d + 1), (‖f i‖₊ : ℝ≥0∞)^2 * ∫⁻ (x : (Vector ℝ d)) in Set.univ, (‖⟪s.k x, s.k x⟫‖₊ : ℝ≥0∞) ∂μ := 
Goals accomplished! 🐙
d: ℕ
H₀: Set (Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
inst✝⁴: NormedAddCommGroup (Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
inst✝³: InnerProductSpace ℝ (Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
s: RKHS H₀
H: Set (ℕ → Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
inst✝²: Inner ℝ (ℕ → Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
inst✝¹: NormedAddCommGroup (ℕ → ℝ)
inst✝: MeasurableSpace (Vector ℝ d)
h_m_set: ∀ (s : Set (Vector ℝ d)), MeasurableSet s
μ: Measure (Vector ℝ d)
h1: product_RKHS H H₀
h3: norm_H H
f: ℕ → Vector ℝ d → ℝ
finH: f ∈ H
abs_to_nnorm✝: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ENNReal.ofReal ‖fun i => f i x‖ = ↑‖fun i => f i x‖₊
H_norm: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ↑‖fun i => f i x‖₊ ^ 2 = ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖f i x‖₊ ^ 2
rkhs: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖f i x‖₊ ^ 2 = ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖⟪f i, RKHS.k H₀ x⟫_ℝ‖₊ ^ 2
cauchy_schwarz_sq: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ∀ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖⟪f i, RKHS.k H₀ x⟫_ℝ‖₊ ^ 2 ≤ ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖RKHS.k H₀ x‖₊ ^ 2
sum_le: (fun x => ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖⟪f i, RKHS.k H₀ x⟫_ℝ‖₊ ^ 2) ≤ fun x =>
  ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖RKHS.k H₀ x‖₊ ^ 2
inverse_sum_int: ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖RKHS.k H₀ x‖₊ ^ 2 ∂μ =
  ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖RKHS.k H₀ x‖₊ ^ 2 ∂μ
C1: ℝ≥0
finite_sum: ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑(‖f i‖₊ ^ 2) < ↑C1
C2: ℝ≥0

  ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ↑‖⟪RKHS.k H₀ x, RKHS.k H₀ x⟫_ℝ‖₊ ∂μ

h1: product_RKHS H H₀
h3: norm_H H
f: ℕ → Vector ℝ d → ℝ
finH: f ∈ H
abs_to_nnorm✝: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ENNReal.ofReal ‖fun i => f i x‖ = ↑‖fun i => f i x‖₊
H_norm: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ↑‖fun i => f i x‖₊ ^ 2 = ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖f i x‖₊ ^ 2
rkhs: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖f i x‖₊ ^ 2 = ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖⟪f i, RKHS.k H₀ x⟫_ℝ‖₊ ^ 2
cauchy_schwarz_sq: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ∀ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖⟪f i, RKHS.k H₀ x⟫_ℝ‖₊ ^ 2 ≤ ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖RKHS.k H₀ x‖₊ ^ 2
sum_le: (fun x => ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖⟪f i, RKHS.k H₀ x⟫_ℝ‖₊ ^ 2) ≤ fun x =>
  ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖RKHS.k H₀ x‖₊ ^ 2
inverse_sum_int: ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖RKHS.k H₀ x‖₊ ^ 2 ∂μ =
  ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖RKHS.k H₀ x‖₊ ^ 2 ∂μ
C1: ℝ≥0
finite_sum: ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑(‖f i‖₊ ^ 2) < ↑C1
C2: ℝ≥0
abs_to_nnorm: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ENNReal.ofReal |RKHS.k H₀ x x| = ↑‖RKHS.k H₀ x x‖₊
h2: ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ↑‖RKHS.k H₀ x x‖₊ ∂μ < ↑C2
∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ↑‖RKHS.k H₀ x‖₊ ^ 2 ∂μ =
  ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ↑‖⟪RKHS.k H₀ x, RKHS.k H₀ x⟫_ℝ‖₊ ∂μ
[Meta.Tactic.simp.rewrite] fun x ↦ nn_norm_eq_norm (s.k x):1000, ↑‖RKHS.k H₀ x‖₊ ==> ENNReal.ofReal ‖RKHS.k H₀ x‖
d: ℕ
H₀: Set (Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
inst✝⁴: NormedAddCommGroup (Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
inst✝³: InnerProductSpace ℝ (Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
s: RKHS H₀
H: Set (ℕ → Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
inst✝²: Inner ℝ (ℕ → Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
inst✝¹: NormedAddCommGroup (ℕ → ℝ)
inst✝: MeasurableSpace (Vector ℝ d)
h_m_set: ∀ (s : Set (Vector ℝ d)), MeasurableSet s
μ: Measure (Vector ℝ d)
h1: product_RKHS H H₀
h3: norm_H H
f: ℕ → Vector ℝ d → ℝ
finH: f ∈ H
abs_to_nnorm✝: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ENNReal.ofReal ‖fun i => f i x‖ = ↑‖fun i => f i x‖₊
H_norm: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ↑‖fun i => f i x‖₊ ^ 2 = ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖f i x‖₊ ^ 2
rkhs: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖f i x‖₊ ^ 2 = ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖⟪f i, RKHS.k H₀ x⟫_ℝ‖₊ ^ 2
cauchy_schwarz_sq: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ∀ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖⟪f i, RKHS.k H₀ x⟫_ℝ‖₊ ^ 2 ≤ ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖RKHS.k H₀ x‖₊ ^ 2
sum_le: (fun x => ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖⟪f i, RKHS.k H₀ x⟫_ℝ‖₊ ^ 2) ≤ fun x =>
  ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖RKHS.k H₀ x‖₊ ^ 2
inverse_sum_int: ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖RKHS.k H₀ x‖₊ ^ 2 ∂μ =
  ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖RKHS.k H₀ x‖₊ ^ 2 ∂μ
C1: ℝ≥0
finite_sum: ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑(‖f i‖₊ ^ 2) < ↑C1
C2: ℝ≥0
abs_to_nnorm: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ENNReal.ofReal |RKHS.k H₀ x x| = ↑‖RKHS.k H₀ x x‖₊
h2: ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ↑‖RKHS.k H₀ x x‖₊ ∂μ < ↑C2
∑ x ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖f x‖₊ ^ 2 * ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ENNReal.ofReal ‖RKHS.k H₀ x‖ ^ 2 ∂μ =
  ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ↑‖⟪RKHS.k H₀ x, RKHS.k H₀ x⟫_ℝ‖₊ ∂μ
d: ℕ
H₀: Set (Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
inst✝⁴: NormedAddCommGroup (Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
inst✝³: InnerProductSpace ℝ (Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
s: RKHS H₀
H: Set (ℕ → Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
inst✝²: Inner ℝ (ℕ → Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
inst✝¹: NormedAddCommGroup (ℕ → ℝ)
inst✝: MeasurableSpace (Vector ℝ d)
h_m_set: ∀ (s : Set (Vector ℝ d)), MeasurableSet s

h1: product_RKHS H H₀
h3: norm_H H
f: ℕ → Vector ℝ d → ℝ
finH: f ∈ H
abs_to_nnorm✝: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ENNReal.ofReal ‖fun i => f i x‖ = ↑‖fun i => f i x‖₊
H_norm: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ↑‖fun i => f i x‖₊ ^ 2 = ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖f i x‖₊ ^ 2
rkhs: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖f i x‖₊ ^ 2 = ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖⟪f i, RKHS.k H₀ x⟫_ℝ‖₊ ^ 2
cauchy_schwarz_sq: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ∀ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖⟪f i, RKHS.k H₀ x⟫_ℝ‖₊ ^ 2 ≤ ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖RKHS.k H₀ x‖₊ ^ 2
sum_le: (fun x => ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖⟪f i, RKHS.k H₀ x⟫_ℝ‖₊ ^ 2) ≤ fun x =>
  ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖RKHS.k H₀ x‖₊ ^ 2
inverse_sum_int: ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖RKHS.k H₀ x‖₊ ^ 2 ∂μ =
  ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖RKHS.k H₀ x‖₊ ^ 2 ∂μ
C1: ℝ≥0
finite_sum: ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑(‖f i‖₊ ^ 2) < ↑C1
C2: ℝ≥0
abs_to_nnorm: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ENNReal.ofReal |RKHS.k H₀ x x| = ↑‖RKHS.k H₀ x x‖₊
h2: ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ↑‖RKHS.k H₀ x x‖₊ ∂μ < ↑C2
∑ x ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖f x‖₊ ^ 2 * ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ENNReal.ofReal ‖RKHS.k H₀ x‖ ^ 2 ∂μ =
  ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ↑‖⟪RKHS.k H₀ x, RKHS.k H₀ x⟫_ℝ‖₊ ∂μ

  ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖RKHS.k H₀ x‖₊ ^ 2
inverse_sum_int: ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖RKHS.k H₀ x‖₊ ^ 2 ∂μ =
  ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖RKHS.k H₀ x‖₊ ^ 2 ∂μ

h1: product_RKHS H H₀
h3: norm_H H
f: ℕ → Vector ℝ d → ℝ
finH: f ∈ H
abs_to_nnorm✝: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ENNReal.ofReal ‖fun i => f i x‖ = ↑‖fun i => f i x‖₊
H_norm: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ↑‖fun i => f i x‖₊ ^ 2 = ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖f i x‖₊ ^ 2
rkhs: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖f i x‖₊ ^ 2 = ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖⟪f i, RKHS.k H₀ x⟫_ℝ‖₊ ^ 2
cauchy_schwarz_sq: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ∀ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖⟪f i, RKHS.k H₀ x⟫_ℝ‖₊ ^ 2 ≤ ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖RKHS.k H₀ x‖₊ ^ 2
sum_le: (fun x => ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖⟪f i, RKHS.k H₀ x⟫_ℝ‖₊ ^ 2) ≤ fun x =>
  ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖RKHS.k H₀ x‖₊ ^ 2
inverse_sum_int: ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖RKHS.k H₀ x‖₊ ^ 2 ∂μ =
  ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖RKHS.k H₀ x‖₊ ^ 2 ∂μ
C1: ℝ≥0
finite_sum: ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑(‖f i‖₊ ^ 2) < ↑C1
C2: ℝ≥0
abs_to_nnorm: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ENNReal.ofReal |RKHS.k H₀ x x| = ↑‖RKHS.k H₀ x x‖₊
h2: ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ↑‖RKHS.k H₀ x x‖₊ ∂μ < ↑C2
∑ x ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖f x‖₊ ^ 2 * ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ENNReal.ofReal ‖RKHS.k H₀ x‖ ^ 2 ∂μ =
  ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ↑‖⟪RKHS.k H₀ x, RKHS.k H₀ x⟫_ℝ‖₊ ∂μ
[Meta.Tactic.simp.rewrite] fun x ↦
      enn_square (norm_nonneg (s.k x)):1000, ENNReal.ofReal ‖RKHS.k H₀ x‖ ^ 2 ==> ENNReal.ofReal (‖RKHS.k H₀ x‖ ^ 2)
d: ℕ
H₀: Set (Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
inst✝⁴: NormedAddCommGroup (Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
inst✝³: InnerProductSpace ℝ (Vector ℝ d → ℝ)

C1: ℝ≥0
finite_sum: ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑(‖f i‖₊ ^ 2) < ↑C1
C2: ℝ≥0
abs_to_nnorm: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ENNReal.ofReal |RKHS.k H₀ x x| = ↑‖RKHS.k H₀ x x‖₊
h2: ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ↑‖RKHS.k H₀ x x‖₊ ∂μ < ↑C2
∑ x ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖f x‖₊ ^ 2 * ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ENNReal.ofReal (‖RKHS.k H₀ x‖ ^ 2) ∂μ =
  ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ↑‖⟪RKHS.k H₀ x, RKHS.k H₀ x⟫_ℝ‖₊ ∂μ

∑ x ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖f x‖₊ ^ 2 * ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ENNReal.ofReal (‖RKHS.k H₀ x‖ ^ 2) ∂μ =
  ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ↑‖⟪RKHS.k H₀ x, RKHS.k H₀ x⟫_ℝ‖₊ ∂μ

h3: norm_H H
f: ℕ → Vector ℝ d → ℝ
finH: f ∈ H
abs_to_nnorm✝: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ENNReal.ofReal ‖fun i => f i x‖ = ↑‖fun i => f i x‖₊
H_norm: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ↑‖fun i => f i x‖₊ ^ 2 = ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖f i x‖₊ ^ 2
rkhs: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖f i x‖₊ ^ 2 = ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖⟪f i, RKHS.k H₀ x⟫_ℝ‖₊ ^ 2
cauchy_schwarz_sq: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ∀ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖⟪f i, RKHS.k H₀ x⟫_ℝ‖₊ ^ 2 ≤ ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖RKHS.k H₀ x‖₊ ^ 2

  ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖RKHS.k H₀ x‖₊ ^ 2
inverse_sum_int: ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖RKHS.k H₀ x‖₊ ^ 2 ∂μ =
  ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖RKHS.k H₀ x‖₊ ^ 2 ∂μ
C1: ℝ≥0
finite_sum: ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑(‖f i‖₊ ^ 2) < ↑C1
C2: ℝ≥0
abs_to_nnorm: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ENNReal.ofReal |RKHS.k H₀ x x| = ↑‖RKHS.k H₀ x x‖₊
h2: ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ↑‖RKHS.k H₀ x x‖₊ ∂μ < ↑C2
∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ↑‖RKHS.k H₀ x‖₊ ^ 2 ∂μ =
  ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ↑‖⟪RKHS.k H₀ x, RKHS.k H₀ x⟫_ℝ‖₊ ∂μ
d: ℕ
H₀: Set (Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
inst✝⁴: NormedAddCommGroup (Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
inst✝³: InnerProductSpace ℝ (Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
s: RKHS H₀
H: Set (ℕ → Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
inst✝²: Inner ℝ (ℕ → Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
inst✝¹: NormedAddCommGroup (ℕ → ℝ)
inst✝: MeasurableSpace (Vector ℝ d)
h_m_set: ∀ (s : Set (Vector ℝ d)), MeasurableSet s
μ: Measure (Vector ℝ d)
h1: product_RKHS H H₀
h3: norm_H H
f: ℕ → Vector ℝ d → ℝ
finH: f ∈ H
abs_to_nnorm✝: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ENNReal.ofReal ‖fun i => f i x‖ = ↑‖fun i => f i x‖₊
H_norm: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ↑‖fun i => f i x‖₊ ^ 2 = ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖f i x‖₊ ^ 2
rkhs: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖f i x‖₊ ^ 2 = ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖⟪f i, RKHS.k H₀ x⟫_ℝ‖₊ ^ 2
cauchy_schwarz_sq: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ∀ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖⟪f i, RKHS.k H₀ x⟫_ℝ‖₊ ^ 2 ≤ ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖RKHS.k H₀ x‖₊ ^ 2
sum_le: (fun x => ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖⟪f i, RKHS.k H₀ x⟫_ℝ‖₊ ^ 2) ≤ fun x =>
  ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖RKHS.k H₀ x‖₊ ^ 2
inverse_sum_int: ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖RKHS.k H₀ x‖₊ ^ 2 ∂μ =
  ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖RKHS.k H₀ x‖₊ ^ 2 ∂μ
C1: ℝ≥0
finite_sum: ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑(‖f i‖₊ ^ 2) < ↑C1
C2: ℝ≥0
abs_to_nnorm: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ENNReal.ofReal |RKHS.k H₀ x x| = ↑‖RKHS.k H₀ x x‖₊
h2: ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ↑‖RKHS.k H₀ x x‖₊ ∂μ < ↑C2
∑ x ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖f x‖₊ ^ 2 * ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ENNReal.ofReal (‖RKHS.k H₀ x‖ ^ 2) ∂μ =
  ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ↑‖⟪RKHS.k H₀ x, RKHS.k H₀ x⟫_ℝ‖₊ ∂μ
Goals accomplished! 🐙

H₀: Set (Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
inst✝⁴: NormedAddCommGroup (Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
inst✝³: InnerProductSpace ℝ (Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
s: RKHS H₀
H: Set (ℕ → Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
inst✝²: Inner ℝ (ℕ → Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
inst✝¹: NormedAddCommGroup (ℕ → ℝ)
inst✝: MeasurableSpace (Vector ℝ d)
h_m_set: ∀ (s : Set (Vector ℝ d)), MeasurableSet s

h1: product_RKHS H H₀
h3: norm_H H
f: ℕ → Vector ℝ d → ℝ
finH: f ∈ H
abs_to_nnorm✝: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ENNReal.ofReal ‖fun i => f i x‖ = ↑‖fun i => f i x‖₊
H_norm: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ↑‖fun i => f i x‖₊ ^ 2 = ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖f i x‖₊ ^ 2
rkhs: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖f i x‖₊ ^ 2 = ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖⟪f i, RKHS.k H₀ x⟫_ℝ‖₊ ^ 2
cauchy_schwarz_sq: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ∀ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖⟪f i, RKHS.k H₀ x⟫_ℝ‖₊ ^ 2 ≤ ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖RKHS.k H₀ x‖₊ ^ 2
sum_le: (fun x => ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖⟪f i, RKHS.k H₀ x⟫_ℝ‖₊ ^ 2) ≤ fun x =>
  ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖RKHS.k H₀ x‖₊ ^ 2
inverse_sum_int: ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖RKHS.k H₀ x‖₊ ^ 2 ∂μ =
  ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖RKHS.k H₀ x‖₊ ^ 2 ∂μ
C1: ℝ≥0
finite_sum: ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑(‖f i‖₊ ^ 2) < ↑C1
C2: ℝ≥0
abs_to_nnorm: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ENNReal.ofReal |RKHS.k H₀ x x| = ↑‖RKHS.k H₀ x x‖₊
h2: ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ↑‖RKHS.k H₀ x x‖₊ ∂μ < ↑C2

  ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖RKHS.k H₀ x‖₊ ^ 2

  ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖RKHS.k H₀ x‖₊ ^ 2
inverse_sum_int: ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖RKHS.k H₀ x‖₊ ^ 2 ∂μ =
  ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖RKHS.k H₀ x‖₊ ^ 2 ∂μ
C1: ℝ≥0
finite_sum: ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑(‖f i‖₊ ^ 2) < ↑C1
C2: ℝ≥0
abs_to_nnorm: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ENNReal.ofReal |RKHS.k H₀ x x| = ↑‖RKHS.k H₀ x x‖₊
h2: ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ↑‖RKHS.k H₀ x x‖₊ ∂μ < ↑C2
x: Vector ℝ d
↑‖RKHS.k H₀ x‖ ^ 2 = ‖RKHS.k H₀ x‖ ^ 2
d: ℕ
H₀: Set (Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
inst✝⁴: NormedAddCommGroup (Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
inst✝³: InnerProductSpace ℝ (Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
s: RKHS H₀
H: Set (ℕ → Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
inst✝²: Inner ℝ (ℕ → Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
inst✝¹: NormedAddCommGroup (ℕ → ℝ)
inst✝: MeasurableSpace (Vector ℝ d)
h_m_set: ∀ (s : Set (Vector ℝ d)), MeasurableSet s
μ: Measure (Vector ℝ d)
h1: product_RKHS H H₀
h3: norm_H H
f: ℕ → Vector ℝ d → ℝ
finH: f ∈ H
abs_to_nnorm✝: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ENNReal.ofReal ‖fun i => f i x‖ = ↑‖fun i => f i x‖₊
H_norm: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ↑‖fun i => f i x‖₊ ^ 2 = ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖f i x‖₊ ^ 2
rkhs: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖f i x‖₊ ^ 2 = ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖⟪f i, RKHS.k H₀ x⟫_ℝ‖₊ ^ 2
cauchy_schwarz_sq: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ∀ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖⟪f i, RKHS.k H₀ x⟫_ℝ‖₊ ^ 2 ≤ ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖RKHS.k H₀ x‖₊ ^ 2
sum_le: (fun x => ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖⟪f i, RKHS.k H₀ x⟫_ℝ‖₊ ^ 2) ≤ fun x =>
  ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖RKHS.k H₀ x‖₊ ^ 2
inverse_sum_int: ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖RKHS.k H₀ x‖₊ ^ 2 ∂μ =
  ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖RKHS.k H₀ x‖₊ ^ 2 ∂μ
C1: ℝ≥0
finite_sum: ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑(‖f i‖₊ ^ 2) < ↑C1
C2: ℝ≥0
abs_to_nnorm: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ENNReal.ofReal |RKHS.k H₀ x x| = ↑‖RKHS.k H₀ x x‖₊
h2: ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ↑‖RKHS.k H₀ x x‖₊ ∂μ < ↑C2
x: Vector ℝ d
↑‖RKHS.k H₀ x‖ ^ 2 = ‖RKHS.k H₀ x‖ ^ 2

inst✝³: InnerProductSpace ℝ (Vector ℝ d → ℝ)

f: ℕ → Vector ℝ d → ℝ
finH: f ∈ H
abs_to_nnorm✝: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ENNReal.ofReal ‖fun i => f i x‖ = ↑‖fun i => f i x‖₊
H_norm: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ↑‖fun i => f i x‖₊ ^ 2 = ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖f i x‖₊ ^ 2
rkhs: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖f i x‖₊ ^ 2 = ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖⟪f i, RKHS.k H₀ x⟫_ℝ‖₊ ^ 2
cauchy_schwarz_sq: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ∀ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖⟪f i, RKHS.k H₀ x⟫_ℝ‖₊ ^ 2 ≤ ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖RKHS.k H₀ x‖₊ ^ 2
sum_le: (fun x => ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖⟪f i, RKHS.k H₀ x⟫_ℝ‖₊ ^ 2) ≤ fun x =>
  ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖RKHS.k H₀ x‖₊ ^ 2
inverse_sum_int: ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖RKHS.k H₀ x‖₊ ^ 2 ∂μ =
  ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖RKHS.k H₀ x‖₊ ^ 2 ∂μ
C1: ℝ≥0
finite_sum: ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑(‖f i‖₊ ^ 2) < ↑C1
C2: ℝ≥0
abs_to_nnorm: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ENNReal.ofReal |RKHS.k H₀ x x| = ↑‖RKHS.k H₀ x x‖₊
h2: ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ↑‖RKHS.k H₀ x x‖₊ ∂μ < ↑C2
∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ⟪RKHS.k H₀ x, RKHS.k H₀ x⟫_ℝ = ‖RKHS.k H₀ x‖ ^ 2
[Meta.Tactic.simp.rewrite] RCLike.ofReal_real_eq_id:1000, RCLike.ofReal ==> id
[Meta.Tactic.simp.rewrite] @id_eq:1000, id ‖RKHS.k H₀ x‖ ==> ‖RKHS.k H₀ x‖
[Meta.Tactic.simp.rewrite] @eq_self:1000, ‖RKHS.k H₀ x‖ ^ 2 = ‖RKHS.k H₀ x‖ ^ 2 ==> True
Goals accomplished! 🐙
Goals accomplished! 🐙

inst✝³: InnerProductSpace ℝ (Vector ℝ d → ℝ)

inst✝²: Inner ℝ (ℕ → Vector ℝ d → ℝ)

f: ℕ → Vector ℝ d → ℝ
finH: f ∈ H
abs_to_nnorm✝: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ENNReal.ofReal ‖fun i => f i x‖ = ↑‖fun i => f i x‖₊
H_norm: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ↑‖fun i => f i x‖₊ ^ 2 = ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖f i x‖₊ ^ 2
rkhs: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖f i x‖₊ ^ 2 = ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖⟪f i, RKHS.k H₀ x⟫_ℝ‖₊ ^ 2
cauchy_schwarz_sq: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ∀ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖⟪f i, RKHS.k H₀ x⟫_ℝ‖₊ ^ 2 ≤ ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖RKHS.k H₀ x‖₊ ^ 2
sum_le: (fun x => ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖⟪f i, RKHS.k H₀ x⟫_ℝ‖₊ ^ 2) ≤ fun x =>
  ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖RKHS.k H₀ x‖₊ ^ 2
inverse_sum_int: ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖RKHS.k H₀ x‖₊ ^ 2 ∂μ =
  ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖RKHS.k H₀ x‖₊ ^ 2 ∂μ
C1: ℝ≥0
finite_sum: ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑(‖f i‖₊ ^ 2) < ↑C1
C2: ℝ≥0
abs_to_nnorm: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ENNReal.ofReal |RKHS.k H₀ x x| = ↑‖RKHS.k H₀ x x‖₊
h2: ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ↑‖RKHS.k H₀ x x‖₊ ∂μ < ↑C2
∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ↑‖RKHS.k H₀ x‖₊ ^ 2 ∂μ =
  ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ↑‖⟪RKHS.k H₀ x, RKHS.k H₀ x⟫_ℝ‖₊ ∂μ

inst✝³: InnerProductSpace ℝ (Vector ℝ d → ℝ)

h_m_set: ∀ (s : Set (Vector ℝ d)), MeasurableSet s
μ: Measure (Vector ℝ d)
h1: product_RKHS H H₀
h3: norm_H H
f: ℕ → Vector ℝ d → ℝ
finH: f ∈ H
abs_to_nnorm✝: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ENNReal.ofReal ‖fun i => f i x‖ = ↑‖fun i => f i x‖₊
H_norm: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ↑‖fun i => f i x‖₊ ^ 2 = ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖f i x‖₊ ^ 2
rkhs: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖f i x‖₊ ^ 2 = ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖⟪f i, RKHS.k H₀ x⟫_ℝ‖₊ ^ 2
cauchy_schwarz_sq: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ∀ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖⟪f i, RKHS.k H₀ x⟫_ℝ‖₊ ^ 2 ≤ ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖RKHS.k H₀ x‖₊ ^ 2
sum_le: (fun x => ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖⟪f i, RKHS.k H₀ x⟫_ℝ‖₊ ^ 2) ≤ fun x =>
  ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖RKHS.k H₀ x‖₊ ^ 2
inverse_sum_int: ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖RKHS.k H₀ x‖₊ ^ 2 ∂μ =
  ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖RKHS.k H₀ x‖₊ ^ 2 ∂μ
C1: ℝ≥0
finite_sum: ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑(‖f i‖₊ ^ 2) < ↑C1
C2: ℝ≥0
abs_to_nnorm: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ENNReal.ofReal |RKHS.k H₀ x x| = ↑‖RKHS.k H₀ x x‖₊
h2: ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ↑‖RKHS.k H₀ x x‖₊ ∂μ < ↑C2
norm_sq_eq_inner: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ⟪RKHS.k H₀ x, RKHS.k H₀ x⟫_ℝ = ‖RKHS.k H₀ x‖ ^ 2
∑ x ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖f x‖₊ ^ 2 * ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ENNReal.ofReal (‖RKHS.k H₀ x‖ ^ 2) ∂μ =
  ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ↑‖⟪RKHS.k H₀ x, RKHS.k H₀ x⟫_ℝ‖₊ ∂μ
[Meta.Tactic.simp.rewrite] norm_sq_eq_inner:1000, ⟪RKHS.k H₀ x, RKHS.k H₀ x⟫_ℝ ==> ‖RKHS.k H₀ x‖ ^ 2

rkhs: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖f i x‖₊ ^ 2 = ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖⟪f i, RKHS.k H₀ x⟫_ℝ‖₊ ^ 2

  ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖RKHS.k H₀ x‖₊ ^ 2
inverse_sum_int: ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖RKHS.k H₀ x‖₊ ^ 2 ∂μ =

  ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ↑‖⟪RKHS.k H₀ x, RKHS.k H₀ x⟫_ℝ‖₊ ∂μ

H₀: Set (Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
inst✝⁴: NormedAddCommGroup (Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
inst✝³: InnerProductSpace ℝ (Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
s: RKHS H₀
H: Set (ℕ → Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
inst✝²: Inner ℝ (ℕ → Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
inst✝¹: NormedAddCommGroup (ℕ → ℝ)
inst✝: MeasurableSpace (Vector ℝ d)
h_m_set: ∀ (s : Set (Vector ℝ d)), MeasurableSet s
μ: Measure (Vector ℝ d)
h1: product_RKHS H H₀
h3: norm_H H
f: ℕ → Vector ℝ d → ℝ
finH: f ∈ H
abs_to_nnorm✝: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ENNReal.ofReal ‖fun i => f i x‖ = ↑‖fun i => f i x‖₊
H_norm: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ↑‖fun i => f i x‖₊ ^ 2 = ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖f i x‖₊ ^ 2
rkhs: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖f i x‖₊ ^ 2 = ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖⟪f i, RKHS.k H₀ x⟫_ℝ‖₊ ^ 2
cauchy_schwarz_sq: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ∀ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖⟪f i, RKHS.k H₀ x⟫_ℝ‖₊ ^ 2 ≤ ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖RKHS.k H₀ x‖₊ ^ 2
sum_le: (fun x => ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖⟪f i, RKHS.k H₀ x⟫_ℝ‖₊ ^ 2) ≤ fun x =>
  ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖RKHS.k H₀ x‖₊ ^ 2
inverse_sum_int: ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖RKHS.k H₀ x‖₊ ^ 2 ∂μ =
  ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖RKHS.k H₀ x‖₊ ^ 2 ∂μ
C1: ℝ≥0
finite_sum: ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑(‖f i‖₊ ^ 2) < ↑C1
C2: ℝ≥0
abs_to_nnorm: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ENNReal.ofReal |RKHS.k H₀ x x| = ↑‖RKHS.k H₀ x x‖₊
h2: ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ↑‖RKHS.k H₀ x x‖₊ ∂μ < ↑C2
norm_sq_eq_inner: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ⟪RKHS.k H₀ x, RKHS.k H₀ x⟫_ℝ = ‖RKHS.k H₀ x‖ ^ 2
∑ x ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖f x‖₊ ^ 2 * ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ENNReal.ofReal (‖RKHS.k H₀ x‖ ^ 2) ∂μ =
  ∑ x ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖f x‖₊ ^ 2 * ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ↑‖‖RKHS.k H₀ x‖ ^ 2‖₊ ∂μ
Goals accomplished! 🐙
d: ℕ
H₀: Set (Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
inst✝⁴: NormedAddCommGroup (Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
inst✝³: InnerProductSpace ℝ (Vector ℝ d → ℝ)

H: Set (ℕ → Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
inst✝²: Inner ℝ (ℕ → Vector ℝ d → ℝ)

h3: norm_H H
f: ℕ → Vector ℝ d → ℝ
finH: f ∈ H
abs_to_nnorm✝: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ENNReal.ofReal ‖fun i => f i x‖ = ↑‖fun i => f i x‖₊
H_norm: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ↑‖fun i => f i x‖₊ ^ 2 = ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖f i x‖₊ ^ 2
rkhs: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖f i x‖₊ ^ 2 = ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖⟪f i, RKHS.k H₀ x⟫_ℝ‖₊ ^ 2
cauchy_schwarz_sq: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ∀ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖⟪f i, RKHS.k H₀ x⟫_ℝ‖₊ ^ 2 ≤ ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖RKHS.k H₀ x‖₊ ^ 2
sum_le: (fun x => ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖⟪f i, RKHS.k H₀ x⟫_ℝ‖₊ ^ 2) ≤ fun x =>
  ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖RKHS.k H₀ x‖₊ ^ 2
inverse_sum_int: ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖RKHS.k H₀ x‖₊ ^ 2 ∂μ =
  ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖RKHS.k H₀ x‖₊ ^ 2 ∂μ
C1: ℝ≥0
finite_sum: ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑(‖f i‖₊ ^ 2) < ↑C1
C2: ℝ≥0
abs_to_nnorm: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ENNReal.ofReal |RKHS.k H₀ x x| = ↑‖RKHS.k H₀ x x‖₊
h2: ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ↑‖RKHS.k H₀ x x‖₊ ∂μ < ↑C2
norm_sq_eq_inner: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ⟪RKHS.k H₀ x, RKHS.k H₀ x⟫_ℝ = ‖RKHS.k H₀ x‖ ^ 2
∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ENNReal.ofReal (‖RKHS.k H₀ x‖ ^ 2) = ↑‖‖RKHS.k H₀ x‖ ^ 2‖₊

H₀: Set (Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
inst✝⁴: NormedAddCommGroup (Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
inst✝³: InnerProductSpace ℝ (Vector ℝ d → ℝ)

f: ℕ → Vector ℝ d → ℝ

abs_to_nnorm✝: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ENNReal.ofReal ‖fun i => f i x‖ = ↑‖fun i => f i x‖₊
H_norm: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ↑‖fun i => f i x‖₊ ^ 2 = ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖f i x‖₊ ^ 2
rkhs: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖f i x‖₊ ^ 2 = ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖⟪f i, RKHS.k H₀ x⟫_ℝ‖₊ ^ 2
cauchy_schwarz_sq: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ∀ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖⟪f i, RKHS.k H₀ x⟫_ℝ‖₊ ^ 2 ≤ ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖RKHS.k H₀ x‖₊ ^ 2
sum_le: (fun x => ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖⟪f i, RKHS.k H₀ x⟫_ℝ‖₊ ^ 2) ≤ fun x =>
  ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖RKHS.k H₀ x‖₊ ^ 2
inverse_sum_int: ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖RKHS.k H₀ x‖₊ ^ 2 ∂μ =
  ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖RKHS.k H₀ x‖₊ ^ 2 ∂μ
C1: ℝ≥0
finite_sum: ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑(‖f i‖₊ ^ 2) < ↑C1
C2: ℝ≥0
abs_to_nnorm: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ENNReal.ofReal |RKHS.k H₀ x x| = ↑‖RKHS.k H₀ x x‖₊
h2: ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ↑‖RKHS.k H₀ x x‖₊ ∂μ < ↑C2

f: ℕ → Vector ℝ d → ℝ
finH: f ∈ H
abs_to_nnorm✝: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ENNReal.ofReal ‖fun i => f i x‖ = ↑‖fun i => f i x‖₊
H_norm: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ↑‖fun i => f i x‖₊ ^ 2 = ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖f i x‖₊ ^ 2
rkhs: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖f i x‖₊ ^ 2 = ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖⟪f i, RKHS.k H₀ x⟫_ℝ‖₊ ^ 2
cauchy_schwarz_sq: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ∀ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖⟪f i, RKHS.k H₀ x⟫_ℝ‖₊ ^ 2 ≤ ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖RKHS.k H₀ x‖₊ ^ 2
sum_le: (fun x => ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖⟪f i, RKHS.k H₀ x⟫_ℝ‖₊ ^ 2) ≤ fun x =>
  ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖RKHS.k H₀ x‖₊ ^ 2
inverse_sum_int: ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖RKHS.k H₀ x‖₊ ^ 2 ∂μ =
  ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖RKHS.k H₀ x‖₊ ^ 2 ∂μ
C1: ℝ≥0
finite_sum: ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑(‖f i‖₊ ^ 2) < ↑C1
C2: ℝ≥0
abs_to_nnorm: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ENNReal.ofReal |RKHS.k H₀ x x| = ↑‖RKHS.k H₀ x x‖₊
h2: ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ↑‖RKHS.k H₀ x x‖₊ ∂μ < ↑C2

∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ENNReal.ofReal (‖RKHS.k H₀ x‖ ^ 2) = ↑‖‖RKHS.k H₀ x‖ ^ 2‖₊

  ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖RKHS.k H₀ x‖₊ ^ 2

finite_sum: ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑(‖f i‖₊ ^ 2) < ↑C1
C2: ℝ≥0
abs_to_nnorm: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ENNReal.ofReal |RKHS.k H₀ x x| = ↑‖RKHS.k H₀ x x‖₊
h2: ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ↑‖RKHS.k H₀ x x‖₊ ∂μ < ↑C2
norm_sq_eq_inner: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ⟪RKHS.k H₀ x, RKHS.k H₀ x⟫_ℝ = ‖RKHS.k H₀ x‖ ^ 2
x: Vector ℝ d
ENNReal.ofReal (‖RKHS.k H₀ x‖ ^ 2) = ENNReal.ofReal ‖‖RKHS.k H₀ x‖ ^ 2‖
d: ℕ
H₀: Set (Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
inst✝⁴: NormedAddCommGroup (Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
inst✝³: InnerProductSpace ℝ (Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
s: RKHS H₀
H: Set (ℕ → Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
inst✝²: Inner ℝ (ℕ → Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
inst✝¹: NormedAddCommGroup (ℕ → ℝ)
inst✝: MeasurableSpace (Vector ℝ d)
h_m_set: ∀ (s : Set (Vector ℝ d)), MeasurableSet s
μ: Measure (Vector ℝ d)
h1: product_RKHS H H₀
h3: norm_H H
f: ℕ → Vector ℝ d → ℝ
finH: f ∈ H
abs_to_nnorm✝: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ENNReal.ofReal ‖fun i => f i x‖ = ↑‖fun i => f i x‖₊
H_norm: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ↑‖fun i => f i x‖₊ ^ 2 = ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖f i x‖₊ ^ 2
rkhs: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖f i x‖₊ ^ 2 = ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖⟪f i, RKHS.k H₀ x⟫_ℝ‖₊ ^ 2
cauchy_schwarz_sq: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ∀ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖⟪f i, RKHS.k H₀ x⟫_ℝ‖₊ ^ 2 ≤ ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖RKHS.k H₀ x‖₊ ^ 2
sum_le: (fun x => ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖⟪f i, RKHS.k H₀ x⟫_ℝ‖₊ ^ 2) ≤ fun x =>
  ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖RKHS.k H₀ x‖₊ ^ 2
inverse_sum_int: ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖RKHS.k H₀ x‖₊ ^ 2 ∂μ =
  ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖RKHS.k H₀ x‖₊ ^ 2 ∂μ
C1: ℝ≥0
finite_sum: ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑(‖f i‖₊ ^ 2) < ↑C1
C2: ℝ≥0
abs_to_nnorm: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ENNReal.ofReal |RKHS.k H₀ x x| = ↑‖RKHS.k H₀ x x‖₊
h2: ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ↑‖RKHS.k H₀ x x‖₊ ∂μ < ↑C2
norm_sq_eq_inner: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ⟪RKHS.k H₀ x, RKHS.k H₀ x⟫_ℝ = ‖RKHS.k H₀ x‖ ^ 2
x: Vector ℝ d
ENNReal.ofReal (‖RKHS.k H₀ x‖ ^ 2) = ENNReal.ofReal ‖‖RKHS.k H₀ x‖ ^ 2‖
d: ℕ
H₀: Set (Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
inst✝⁴: NormedAddCommGroup (Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
inst✝³: InnerProductSpace ℝ (Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
s: RKHS H₀
H: Set (ℕ → Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
inst✝²: Inner ℝ (ℕ → Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
inst✝¹: NormedAddCommGroup (ℕ → ℝ)
inst✝: MeasurableSpace (Vector ℝ d)
h_m_set: ∀ (s : Set (Vector ℝ d)), MeasurableSet s
μ: Measure (Vector ℝ d)
h1: product_RKHS H H₀
h3: norm_H H
f: ℕ → Vector ℝ d → ℝ
finH: f ∈ H
abs_to_nnorm✝: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ENNReal.ofReal ‖fun i => f i x‖ = ↑‖fun i => f i x‖₊
H_norm: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ↑‖fun i => f i x‖₊ ^ 2 = ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖f i x‖₊ ^ 2
rkhs: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖f i x‖₊ ^ 2 = ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖⟪f i, RKHS.k H₀ x⟫_ℝ‖₊ ^ 2
cauchy_schwarz_sq: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ∀ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖⟪f i, RKHS.k H₀ x⟫_ℝ‖₊ ^ 2 ≤ ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖RKHS.k H₀ x‖₊ ^ 2
sum_le: (fun x => ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖⟪f i, RKHS.k H₀ x⟫_ℝ‖₊ ^ 2) ≤ fun x =>
  ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖RKHS.k H₀ x‖₊ ^ 2
inverse_sum_int: ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖RKHS.k H₀ x‖₊ ^ 2 ∂μ =
  ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖RKHS.k H₀ x‖₊ ^ 2 ∂μ
C1: ℝ≥0
finite_sum: ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑(‖f i‖₊ ^ 2) < ↑C1
C2: ℝ≥0
abs_to_nnorm: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ENNReal.ofReal |RKHS.k H₀ x x| = ↑‖RKHS.k H₀ x x‖₊
h2: ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ↑‖RKHS.k H₀ x x‖₊ ∂μ < ↑C2
norm_sq_eq_inner: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ⟪RKHS.k H₀ x, RKHS.k H₀ x⟫_ℝ = ‖RKHS.k H₀ x‖ ^ 2
∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ENNReal.ofReal (‖RKHS.k H₀ x‖ ^ 2) = ↑‖‖RKHS.k H₀ x‖ ^ 2‖₊
[Meta.Tactic.simp.rewrite] @norm_pow:1000, ‖‖RKHS.k H₀ x‖ ^ 2‖ ==> ‖‖RKHS.k H₀ x‖‖ ^ 2
[Meta.Tactic.simp.rewrite] @norm_norm:1001, ‖‖RKHS.k H₀ x‖‖ ==> ‖RKHS.k H₀ x‖
[Meta.Tactic.simp.rewrite] @eq_self:1000, ENNReal.ofReal (‖RKHS.k H₀ x‖ ^ 2) =
      ENNReal.ofReal (‖RKHS.k H₀ x‖ ^ 2) ==> True
Goals accomplished! 🐙
Goals accomplished! 🐙
d: ℕ
H₀: Set (Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
inst✝⁴: NormedAddCommGroup (Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
inst✝³: InnerProductSpace ℝ (Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
s: RKHS H₀
H: Set (ℕ → Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
inst✝²: Inner ℝ (ℕ → Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
inst✝¹: NormedAddCommGroup (ℕ → ℝ)
inst✝: MeasurableSpace (Vector ℝ d)

h3: norm_H H
f: ℕ → Vector ℝ d → ℝ
finH: f ∈ H
abs_to_nnorm✝: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ENNReal.ofReal ‖fun i => f i x‖ = ↑‖fun i => f i x‖₊
H_norm: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ↑‖fun i => f i x‖₊ ^ 2 = ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖f i x‖₊ ^ 2
rkhs: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖f i x‖₊ ^ 2 = ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖⟪f i, RKHS.k H₀ x⟫_ℝ‖₊ ^ 2
cauchy_schwarz_sq: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ∀ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖⟪f i, RKHS.k H₀ x⟫_ℝ‖₊ ^ 2 ≤ ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖RKHS.k H₀ x‖₊ ^ 2
sum_le: (fun x => ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖⟪f i, RKHS.k H₀ x⟫_ℝ‖₊ ^ 2) ≤ fun x =>
  ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖RKHS.k H₀ x‖₊ ^ 2
inverse_sum_int: ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖RKHS.k H₀ x‖₊ ^ 2 ∂μ =
  ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖RKHS.k H₀ x‖₊ ^ 2 ∂μ
C1: ℝ≥0
finite_sum: ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑(‖f i‖₊ ^ 2) < ↑C1
C2: ℝ≥0
abs_to_nnorm: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ENNReal.ofReal |RKHS.k H₀ x x| = ↑‖RKHS.k H₀ x x‖₊

∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ↑‖RKHS.k H₀ x‖₊ ^ 2 ∂μ =
  ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ↑‖⟪RKHS.k H₀ x, RKHS.k H₀ x⟫_ℝ‖₊ ∂μ
d: ℕ
H₀: Set (Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
inst✝⁴: NormedAddCommGroup (Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
inst✝³: InnerProductSpace ℝ (Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
s: RKHS H₀
H: Set (ℕ → Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
inst✝²: Inner ℝ (ℕ → Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
inst✝¹: NormedAddCommGroup (ℕ → ℝ)
inst✝: MeasurableSpace (Vector ℝ d)
h_m_set: ∀ (s : Set (Vector ℝ d)), MeasurableSet s
μ: Measure (Vector ℝ d)
h1: product_RKHS H H₀
h3: norm_H H
f: ℕ → Vector ℝ d → ℝ
finH: f ∈ H
abs_to_nnorm✝: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ENNReal.ofReal ‖fun i => f i x‖ = ↑‖fun i => f i x‖₊
H_norm: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ↑‖fun i => f i x‖₊ ^ 2 = ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖f i x‖₊ ^ 2
rkhs: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖f i x‖₊ ^ 2 = ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖⟪f i, RKHS.k H₀ x⟫_ℝ‖₊ ^ 2
cauchy_schwarz_sq: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ∀ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖⟪f i, RKHS.k H₀ x⟫_ℝ‖₊ ^ 2 ≤ ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖RKHS.k H₀ x‖₊ ^ 2
sum_le: (fun x => ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖⟪f i, RKHS.k H₀ x⟫_ℝ‖₊ ^ 2) ≤ fun x =>
  ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖RKHS.k H₀ x‖₊ ^ 2
inverse_sum_int: ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖RKHS.k H₀ x‖₊ ^ 2 ∂μ =
  ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖RKHS.k H₀ x‖₊ ^ 2 ∂μ
C1: ℝ≥0
finite_sum: ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑(‖f i‖₊ ^ 2) < ↑C1
C2: ℝ≥0
abs_to_nnorm: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ENNReal.ofReal |RKHS.k H₀ x x| = ↑‖RKHS.k H₀ x x‖₊
h2: ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ↑‖RKHS.k H₀ x x‖₊ ∂μ < ↑C2
norm_sq_eq_inner: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ⟪RKHS.k H₀ x, RKHS.k H₀ x⟫_ℝ = ‖RKHS.k H₀ x‖ ^ 2
coe: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ENNReal.ofReal (‖RKHS.k H₀ x‖ ^ 2) = ↑‖‖RKHS.k H₀ x‖ ^ 2‖₊
∑ x ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖f x‖₊ ^ 2 * ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ENNReal.ofReal (‖RKHS.k H₀ x‖ ^ 2) ∂μ =
  ∑ x ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖f x‖₊ ^ 2 * ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ↑‖‖RKHS.k H₀ x‖ ^ 2‖₊ ∂μ
[Meta.Tactic.simp.rewrite] coe:1000, ENNReal.ofReal (‖RKHS.k H₀ x‖ ^ 2) ==> ↑‖‖RKHS.k H₀ x‖ ^ 2‖₊
[Meta.Tactic.simp.rewrite] @eq_self:1000, ∑ x ∈ Finset.range (d + 1),
        ↑‖f x‖₊ ^ 2 * ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ↑‖‖RKHS.k H₀ x‖ ^ 2‖₊ ∂μ =
      ∑ x ∈ Finset.range (d + 1), ↑‖f x‖₊ ^ 2 * ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ↑‖‖RKHS.k H₀ x‖ ^ 2‖₊ ∂μ ==> True
Goals accomplished! 🐙
Goals accomplished! 🐙
Goals accomplished! 🐙


  -- Use the reproducing propriety of H₀ to write ⟪k x, k x⟫ as k x x.
  _ = ∑ i in range (d + 1), (‖f i‖₊ : ℝ≥0∞)^2 * ∫⁻ (x : (Vector ℝ d)) in Set.univ, (‖s.k x x‖₊ : ℝ≥0∞) ∂μ := 
Goals accomplished! 🐙
d: ℕ
H₀: Set (Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
inst✝⁴: NormedAddCommGroup (Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
inst✝³: InnerProductSpace ℝ (Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
s: RKHS H₀
H: Set (ℕ → Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
inst✝²: Inner ℝ (ℕ → Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
inst✝¹: NormedAddCommGroup (ℕ → ℝ)
inst✝: MeasurableSpace (Vector ℝ d)
h_m_set: ∀ (s : Set (Vector ℝ d)), MeasurableSet s
μ: Measure (Vector ℝ d)
h1: product_RKHS H H₀
h3: norm_H H
f: ℕ → Vector ℝ d → ℝ
finH: f ∈ H
abs_to_nnorm✝: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ENNReal.ofReal ‖fun i => f i x‖ = ↑‖fun i => f i x‖₊
H_norm: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ↑‖fun i => f i x‖₊ ^ 2 = ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖f i x‖₊ ^ 2
rkhs: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖f i x‖₊ ^ 2 = ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖⟪f i, RKHS.k H₀ x⟫_ℝ‖₊ ^ 2
cauchy_schwarz_sq: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ∀ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖⟪f i, RKHS.k H₀ x⟫_ℝ‖₊ ^ 2 ≤ ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖RKHS.k H₀ x‖₊ ^ 2
sum_le: (fun x => ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖⟪f i, RKHS.k H₀ x⟫_ℝ‖₊ ^ 2) ≤ fun x =>
  ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖RKHS.k H₀ x‖₊ ^ 2
inverse_sum_int: ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖RKHS.k H₀ x‖₊ ^ 2 ∂μ =
  ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖RKHS.k H₀ x‖₊ ^ 2 ∂μ
C1: ℝ≥0
finite_sum: ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑(‖f i‖₊ ^ 2) < ↑C1
C2: ℝ≥0
abs_to_nnorm: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ENNReal.ofReal |RKHS.k H₀ x x| = ↑‖RKHS.k H₀ x x‖₊
h2: ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ↑‖RKHS.k H₀ x x‖₊ ∂μ < ↑C2
∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ↑‖⟪RKHS.k H₀ x, RKHS.k H₀ x⟫_ℝ‖₊ ∂μ =
  ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ↑‖RKHS.k H₀ x x‖₊ ∂μ

  ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖RKHS.k H₀ x‖₊ ^ 2

finite_sum: ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑(‖f i‖₊ ^ 2) < ↑C1
C2: ℝ≥0
abs_to_nnorm: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ENNReal.ofReal |RKHS.k H₀ x x| = ↑‖RKHS.k H₀ x x‖₊
h2: ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ↑‖RKHS.k H₀ x x‖₊ ∂μ < ↑C2
∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ↑‖⟪RKHS.k H₀ x, RKHS.k H₀ x⟫_ℝ‖₊ ∂μ =
  ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ↑‖RKHS.k H₀ x x‖₊ ∂μ
d: ℕ
H₀: Set (Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
inst✝⁴: NormedAddCommGroup (Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
inst✝³: InnerProductSpace ℝ (Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
s: RKHS H₀
H: Set (ℕ → Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
inst✝²: Inner ℝ (ℕ → Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
inst✝¹: NormedAddCommGroup (ℕ → ℝ)
inst✝: MeasurableSpace (Vector ℝ d)
h_m_set: ∀ (s : Set (Vector ℝ d)), MeasurableSet s
μ: Measure (Vector ℝ d)
h1: product_RKHS H H₀
h3: norm_H H
f: ℕ → Vector ℝ d → ℝ
finH: f ∈ H
abs_to_nnorm✝: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ENNReal.ofReal ‖fun i => f i x‖ = ↑‖fun i => f i x‖₊
H_norm: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ↑‖fun i => f i x‖₊ ^ 2 = ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖f i x‖₊ ^ 2
rkhs: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖f i x‖₊ ^ 2 = ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖⟪f i, RKHS.k H₀ x⟫_ℝ‖₊ ^ 2
cauchy_schwarz_sq: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ∀ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖⟪f i, RKHS.k H₀ x⟫_ℝ‖₊ ^ 2 ≤ ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖RKHS.k H₀ x‖₊ ^ 2
sum_le: (fun x => ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖⟪f i, RKHS.k H₀ x⟫_ℝ‖₊ ^ 2) ≤ fun x =>
  ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖RKHS.k H₀ x‖₊ ^ 2
inverse_sum_int: ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖RKHS.k H₀ x‖₊ ^ 2 ∂μ =
  ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖RKHS.k H₀ x‖₊ ^ 2 ∂μ
C1: ℝ≥0
finite_sum: ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑(‖f i‖₊ ^ 2) < ↑C1
C2: ℝ≥0
abs_to_nnorm: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ENNReal.ofReal |RKHS.k H₀ x x| = ↑‖RKHS.k H₀ x x‖₊
h2: ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ↑‖RKHS.k H₀ x x‖₊ ∂μ < ↑C2
∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ↑‖⟪RKHS.k H₀ x, RKHS.k H₀ x⟫_ℝ‖₊ ∂μ =
  ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ↑‖RKHS.k H₀ x x‖₊ ∂μ
Goals accomplished! 🐙
