h2: ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ↑‖RKHS.k H₀ x x‖₊ ∂μ < ↑C2
x: Vector ℝ d
⟪RKHS.k H₀ x, RKHS.k H₀ x⟫_ℝ = ⟪RKHS.k H₀ x, RKHS.k H₀ x⟫_ℝ
Goals accomplished! 🐙
Goals accomplished! 🐙
d: ℕ
H₀: Set (Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
inst✝⁴: NormedAddCommGroup (Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
inst✝³: InnerProductSpace ℝ (Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
s: RKHS H₀
H: Set (ℕ → Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
inst✝²: Inner ℝ (ℕ → Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
inst✝¹: NormedAddCommGroup (ℕ → ℝ)
inst✝: MeasurableSpace (Vector ℝ d)
h_m_set: ∀ (s : Set (Vector ℝ d)), MeasurableSet s
μ: Measure (Vector ℝ d)
h1: product_RKHS H H₀
h3: norm_H H
f: ℕ → Vector ℝ d → ℝ
finH: f ∈ H
abs_to_nnorm✝: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ENNReal.ofReal ‖fun i => f i x‖ = ↑‖fun i => f i x‖₊
H_norm: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ↑‖fun i => f i x‖₊ ^ 2 = ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖f i x‖₊ ^ 2
rkhs: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖f i x‖₊ ^ 2 = ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖⟪f i, RKHS.k H₀ x⟫_ℝ‖₊ ^ 2
cauchy_schwarz_sq: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ∀ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖⟪f i, RKHS.k H₀ x⟫_ℝ‖₊ ^ 2 ≤ ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖RKHS.k H₀ x‖₊ ^ 2
sum_le: (fun x => ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖⟪f i, RKHS.k H₀ x⟫_ℝ‖₊ ^ 2) ≤ fun x =>
  ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖RKHS.k H₀ x‖₊ ^ 2
inverse_sum_int: ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖RKHS.k H₀ x‖₊ ^ 2 ∂μ =
  ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖RKHS.k H₀ x‖₊ ^ 2 ∂μ
C1: ℝ≥0
finite_sum: ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑(‖f i‖₊ ^ 2) < ↑C1
C2: ℝ≥0
abs_to_nnorm: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ENNReal.ofReal |RKHS.k H₀ x x| = ↑‖RKHS.k H₀ x x‖₊
h2: ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ↑‖RKHS.k H₀ x x‖₊ ∂μ < ↑C2
∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ↑‖⟪RKHS.k H₀ x, RKHS.k H₀ x⟫_ℝ‖₊ ∂μ =
  ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ↑‖RKHS.k H₀ x x‖₊ ∂μ
d: ℕ
H₀: Set (Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
inst✝⁴: NormedAddCommGroup (Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
inst✝³: InnerProductSpace ℝ (Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
s: RKHS H₀
H: Set (ℕ → Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
inst✝²: Inner ℝ (ℕ → Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
inst✝¹: NormedAddCommGroup (ℕ → ℝ)
inst✝: MeasurableSpace (Vector ℝ d)
h_m_set: ∀ (s : Set (Vector ℝ d)), MeasurableSet s
μ: Measure (Vector ℝ d)
h1: product_RKHS H H₀
h3: norm_H H
f: ℕ → Vector ℝ d → ℝ
finH: f ∈ H
abs_to_nnorm✝: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ENNReal.ofReal ‖fun i => f i x‖ = ↑‖fun i => f i x‖₊
H_norm: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ↑‖fun i => f i x‖₊ ^ 2 = ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖f i x‖₊ ^ 2
rkhs: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖f i x‖₊ ^ 2 = ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖⟪f i, RKHS.k H₀ x⟫_ℝ‖₊ ^ 2
cauchy_schwarz_sq: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ∀ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖⟪f i, RKHS.k H₀ x⟫_ℝ‖₊ ^ 2 ≤ ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖RKHS.k H₀ x‖₊ ^ 2
sum_le: (fun x => ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖⟪f i, RKHS.k H₀ x⟫_ℝ‖₊ ^ 2) ≤ fun x =>
  ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖RKHS.k H₀ x‖₊ ^ 2
inverse_sum_int: ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖RKHS.k H₀ x‖₊ ^ 2 ∂μ =
  ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖RKHS.k H₀ x‖₊ ^ 2 ∂μ
C1: ℝ≥0
finite_sum: ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑(‖f i‖₊ ^ 2) < ↑C1
C2: ℝ≥0
abs_to_nnorm: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ENNReal.ofReal |RKHS.k H₀ x x| = ↑‖RKHS.k H₀ x x‖₊
h2: ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ↑‖RKHS.k H₀ x x‖₊ ∂μ < ↑C2
reproducing_prop: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ⟪RKHS.k H₀ x, RKHS.k H₀ x⟫_ℝ = RKHS.k H₀ x x
∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ↑‖⟪RKHS.k H₀ x, RKHS.k H₀ x⟫_ℝ‖₊ ∂μ =
  ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ↑‖RKHS.k H₀ x x‖₊ ∂μ
[Meta.Tactic.simp.rewrite] reproducing_prop:1000, ⟪RKHS.k H₀ x, RKHS.k H₀ x⟫_ℝ ==> RKHS.k H₀ x x
[Meta.Tactic.simp.rewrite] @eq_self:1000, ∑ x ∈ Finset.range (d + 1),
        ↑‖f x‖₊ ^ 2 * ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ↑‖RKHS.k H₀ x x‖₊ ∂μ =
      ∑ x ∈ Finset.range (d + 1), ↑‖f x‖₊ ^ 2 * ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ↑‖RKHS.k H₀ x x‖₊ ∂μ ==> True
Goals accomplished! 🐙
Goals accomplished! 🐙
Goals accomplished! 🐙


  -- As the integral is a constant in the sum, write ∑ i in ... * ∫⁻ ... as (∑ i in ...) * ∫⁻ ...
  _ = (∑ i in range (d + 1), (‖f i‖₊ : ℝ≥0∞)^2) * ∫⁻ (x : (Vector ℝ d)) in Set.univ, (‖s.k x x‖₊ : ℝ≥0∞) ∂μ :=

(∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2) * ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ↑‖RKHS.k H₀ x x‖₊ ∂μ =
  ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ↑‖RKHS.k H₀ x x‖₊ ∂μ

d: ℕ
H₀: Set (Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
inst✝⁴: NormedAddCommGroup (Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
inst✝³: InnerProductSpace ℝ (Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
s: RKHS H₀
H: Set (ℕ → Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
inst✝²: Inner ℝ (ℕ → Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
inst✝¹: NormedAddCommGroup (ℕ → ℝ)
inst✝: MeasurableSpace (Vector ℝ d)
h_m_set: ∀ (s : Set (Vector ℝ d)), MeasurableSet s
μ: Measure (Vector ℝ d)
h1: product_RKHS H H₀
h3: norm_H H
f: ℕ → Vector ℝ d → ℝ
finH: f ∈ H
abs_to_nnorm✝: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ENNReal.ofReal ‖fun i => f i x‖ = ↑‖fun i => f i x‖₊
H_norm: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ↑‖fun i => f i x‖₊ ^ 2 = ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖f i x‖₊ ^ 2
rkhs: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖f i x‖₊ ^ 2 = ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖⟪f i, RKHS.k H₀ x⟫_ℝ‖₊ ^ 2
cauchy_schwarz_sq: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ∀ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖⟪f i, RKHS.k H₀ x⟫_ℝ‖₊ ^ 2 ≤ ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖RKHS.k H₀ x‖₊ ^ 2
sum_le: (fun x => ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖⟪f i, RKHS.k H₀ x⟫_ℝ‖₊ ^ 2) ≤ fun x =>
  ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖RKHS.k H₀ x‖₊ ^ 2
inverse_sum_int: ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖RKHS.k H₀ x‖₊ ^ 2 ∂μ =
  ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖RKHS.k H₀ x‖₊ ^ 2 ∂μ
C1: ℝ≥0
finite_sum: ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑(‖f i‖₊ ^ 2) < ↑C1
C2: ℝ≥0
abs_to_nnorm: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ENNReal.ofReal |RKHS.k H₀ x x| = ↑‖RKHS.k H₀ x x‖₊
h2: ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ↑‖RKHS.k H₀ x x‖₊ ∂μ < ↑C2
∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ↑‖RKHS.k H₀ x x‖₊ ∂μ =
  (∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2) * ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ↑‖RKHS.k H₀ x x‖₊ ∂μ
d: ℕ
H₀: Set (Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
inst✝⁴: NormedAddCommGroup (Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
inst✝³: InnerProductSpace ℝ (Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
s: RKHS H₀
H: Set (ℕ → Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
inst✝²: Inner ℝ (ℕ → Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
inst✝¹: NormedAddCommGroup (ℕ → ℝ)
inst✝: MeasurableSpace (Vector ℝ d)
h_m_set: ∀ (s : Set (Vector ℝ d)), MeasurableSet s
μ: Measure (Vector ℝ d)
h1: product_RKHS H H₀
h3: norm_H H
f: ℕ → Vector ℝ d → ℝ
finH: f ∈ H
abs_to_nnorm✝: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ENNReal.ofReal ‖fun i => f i x‖ = ↑‖fun i => f i x‖₊
H_norm: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ↑‖fun i => f i x‖₊ ^ 2 = ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖f i x‖₊ ^ 2
rkhs: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖f i x‖₊ ^ 2 = ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖⟪f i, RKHS.k H₀ x⟫_ℝ‖₊ ^ 2
cauchy_schwarz_sq: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ∀ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖⟪f i, RKHS.k H₀ x⟫_ℝ‖₊ ^ 2 ≤ ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖RKHS.k H₀ x‖₊ ^ 2
sum_le: (fun x => ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖⟪f i, RKHS.k H₀ x⟫_ℝ‖₊ ^ 2) ≤ fun x =>
  ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖RKHS.k H₀ x‖₊ ^ 2
inverse_sum_int: ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖RKHS.k H₀ x‖₊ ^ 2 ∂μ =
  ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖RKHS.k H₀ x‖₊ ^ 2 ∂μ
C1: ℝ≥0
finite_sum: ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑(‖f i‖₊ ^ 2) < ↑C1
C2: ℝ≥0
abs_to_nnorm: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ENNReal.ofReal |RKHS.k H₀ x x| = ↑‖RKHS.k H₀ x x‖₊
h2: ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ↑‖RKHS.k H₀ x x‖₊ ∂μ < ↑C2
sum_mul: (∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2) * ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ↑‖RKHS.k H₀ x x‖₊ ∂μ =
  ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ↑‖RKHS.k H₀ x x‖₊ ∂μ
∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ↑‖RKHS.k H₀ x x‖₊ ∂μ =
  (∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2) * ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ↑‖RKHS.k H₀ x x‖₊ ∂μ

  -- Bound the product from above using the two previously retrieved majorants.
  _ < C1 * C2 := ENNReal.mul_lt_mul finite_sum h2

  -- C1 C2 ∈ ℝ≥0
  _ < ∞ := 
Goals accomplished! 🐙

  ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖RKHS.k H₀ x‖₊ ^ 2

H₀: Set (Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
inst✝⁴: NormedAddCommGroup (Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
inst✝³: InnerProductSpace ℝ (Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
s: RKHS H₀
H: Set (ℕ → Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
inst✝²: Inner ℝ (ℕ → Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
inst✝¹: NormedAddCommGroup (ℕ → ℝ)
inst✝: MeasurableSpace (Vector ℝ d)
h_m_set: ∀ (s : Set (Vector ℝ d)), MeasurableSet s
μ: Measure (Vector ℝ d)
h1✝: product_RKHS H H₀
h3: norm_H H
f: ℕ → Vector ℝ d → ℝ
finH: f ∈ H
abs_to_nnorm✝: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ENNReal.ofReal ‖fun i => f i x‖ = ↑‖fun i => f i x‖₊
H_norm: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ↑‖fun i => f i x‖₊ ^ 2 = ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖f i x‖₊ ^ 2
rkhs: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖f i x‖₊ ^ 2 = ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖⟪f i, RKHS.k H₀ x⟫_ℝ‖₊ ^ 2
cauchy_schwarz_sq: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ∀ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖⟪f i, RKHS.k H₀ x⟫_ℝ‖₊ ^ 2 ≤ ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖RKHS.k H₀ x‖₊ ^ 2
sum_le: (fun x => ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖⟪f i, RKHS.k H₀ x⟫_ℝ‖₊ ^ 2) ≤ fun x =>
  ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖RKHS.k H₀ x‖₊ ^ 2
inverse_sum_int: ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖RKHS.k H₀ x‖₊ ^ 2 ∂μ =
  ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖RKHS.k H₀ x‖₊ ^ 2 ∂μ
C1: ℝ≥0
finite_sum: ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑(‖f i‖₊ ^ 2) < ↑C1
C2: ℝ≥0
abs_to_nnorm: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ENNReal.ofReal |RKHS.k H₀ x x| = ↑‖RKHS.k H₀ x x‖₊
h2✝: ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ↑‖RKHS.k H₀ x x‖₊ ∂μ < ↑C2
h1: ↑C1 < ⊤
h2: ↑C2 < ⊤
↑C1 * ↑C2 < ⊤
d: ℕ
H₀: Set (Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
inst✝⁴: NormedAddCommGroup (Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
inst✝³: InnerProductSpace ℝ (Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
s: RKHS H₀
H: Set (ℕ → Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
inst✝²: Inner ℝ (ℕ → Vector ℝ d → ℝ)
inst✝¹: NormedAddCommGroup (ℕ → ℝ)
inst✝: MeasurableSpace (Vector ℝ d)
h_m_set: ∀ (s : Set (Vector ℝ d)), MeasurableSet s
μ: Measure (Vector ℝ d)
h1: product_RKHS H H₀
h3: norm_H H
f: ℕ → Vector ℝ d → ℝ
finH: f ∈ H
abs_to_nnorm✝: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ENNReal.ofReal ‖fun i => f i x‖ = ↑‖fun i => f i x‖₊
H_norm: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ↑‖fun i => f i x‖₊ ^ 2 = ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖f i x‖₊ ^ 2
rkhs: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖f i x‖₊ ^ 2 = ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖⟪f i, RKHS.k H₀ x⟫_ℝ‖₊ ^ 2
cauchy_schwarz_sq: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ∀ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖⟪f i, RKHS.k H₀ x⟫_ℝ‖₊ ^ 2 ≤ ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖RKHS.k H₀ x‖₊ ^ 2
sum_le: (fun x => ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖⟪f i, RKHS.k H₀ x⟫_ℝ‖₊ ^ 2) ≤ fun x =>
  ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖RKHS.k H₀ x‖₊ ^ 2
inverse_sum_int: ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖RKHS.k H₀ x‖₊ ^ 2 ∂μ =
  ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ↑‖f i‖₊ ^ 2 * ↑‖RKHS.k H₀ x‖₊ ^ 2 ∂μ
C1: ℝ≥0
finite_sum: ∑ i ∈ range (d + 1), ↑(‖f i‖₊ ^ 2) < ↑C1
C2: ℝ≥0
abs_to_nnorm: ∀ (x : Vector ℝ d), ENNReal.ofReal |RKHS.k H₀ x x| = ↑‖RKHS.k H₀ x x‖₊
h2: ∫⁻ (x : Vector ℝ d) in Set.univ, ↑‖RKHS.k H₀ x x‖₊ ∂μ < ↑C2
↑C1 * ↑C2 < ⊤
Goals accomplished! 🐙
Goals accomplished! 🐙
